anya-e0903n0:5_0: Pucchā – paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo mahātheravarā
anya-e0903n0:5_1: porāṇasaṃgītikārā paṭhamaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ
anya-e0903n0:5_2: saṃgāyantā dīghanikāyañca majjhimanikāyañca saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ kiṃnāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n0:6_0: Vissajjanā – paṭhamamahāsaṃgītikāle bhante dhammasaṃgāhakā mahākassapādayo porāṇatheravarā
anya-e0903n0:6_1: paṭhamaṃ vinayapiṭakaṃ saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ saṃgāyantā dīghanikāyañca
anya-e0903n0:6_2: majjhimanikāyañca saṃgāyitvā tadanantaraṃ sattahi ca suttasahassehi sattahi ca suttasatehi
anya-e0903n0:6_3: dvāsaṭṭhiyā ca suttehi paṭimaṇḍitaṃ bhāṇavārasataparimāṇaṃ saṃyuttanikāyaṃ nāma pāvacanaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n0:7: Pucchā – saṃyuttanikāye ca āvuso sagāthāvaggo nidānavaggo khandhavaggo saḷāyatanavaggo mahāvaggoti pañcasaṃyuttappakaraṇāni, tesu paṭhamaṃ kataraṃ saṃyuttappakaraṇaṃ te saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n0:8: Vissajjanā – pañcasu bhante saṃyuttappakaraṇesu paṭhamaṃ sagāthāvaggasaṃyuttappakaraṇaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n0:9: Pucchā – sagāthāvaggepi āvuso devatāsaṃyuttādivasena ekādasasaṃyuttāni, tesu paṭhamaṃ kataraṃ saṃyuttaṃ te saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n0:10: Vissajjanā – ekādasasu bhante saṃyuttesu paṭhamaṃ devatāsaṃyuttaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n0:11: Pucchā – devatāsaṃyuttepi āvuso naḷavaggādayo aṭṭha vaggā, oghataraṇasuttādīni ca ekāsīti suttāni, tesu paṭhamaṃ kataraṃ vaggaṃ katarañca suttaṃ sagāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n0:12: Vissajjanā – aṭṭhasu bhante vaggesu paṭhamaṃ naḷavaggaṃ ekāsītiyā ca suttesu paṭhamaṃ oghataraṇasuttaṃ saṃgāyiṃsu.
anya-e0903n0:13: Sādhu sādhu āvuso, mayampi dāni tatoyeva paṭṭhāya saṃgītipubbaṅgamāni pucchanavissajjanakiccāni āvahituṃ samārabhāra.
anya-e0903n0:16: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena oghataraṇasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:17_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ devataṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, aññatarā bhante
anya-e0903n0:17_1: devatā abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ jetavanaṃ obhāsetvā yena
anya-e0903n0:17_2: bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi, ekamantaṃ
anya-e0903n0:17_3: ṭhitā kho sā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kathaṃ nu tvaṃ mārisa oghamatarī”ti,
anya-e0903n0:18: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “apatiṭṭhaṃ khvāhaṃ āvuso anāyūhaṃ oghamatariṃ”ti, evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:20: Pucchā – accentisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:21: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ devataṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññatarā bhante devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca–
anya-e0903n0:33: Pucchā – sattisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:34: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ devataṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, aññatarā bhante devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca–
anya-e0903n0:46: Pucchā – jaṭāsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:47: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ devataṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, aññatarā bhante devatā bhavagantaṃ etadavoca–
anya-e0903n0:49: Taṃ taṃ gotama pucchāmi, ko imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭa”nti–
anya-e0903n0:51: Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:52: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:53: Yesaṃ rāgo ca doso ca, avijjā ca virājitā;
anya-e0903n0:56: Sīle patiṭṭhāya naro sapañño, cittaṃ paññañca bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:57: Ātāpī nipako bhikkhu, so imaṃ vijaṭaye jaṭaṃ–
anya-e0903n0:58: Yesaṃ rāgo ca doso ca, avijjā ca virājitā;
anya-e0903n0:61: Paṭighaṃ rūpasaññā ca, etthesā chijjate jaṭā.
anya-e0903n0:63: Pucchā – accharāsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:64: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ devaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññataro bhante devaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca–
anya-e0903n0:66: Vanantaṃ mohanaṃ nāma, kathaṃ yātrā bhavissatī”ti.
anya-e0903n0:68: “Ujuko nāma so maggo, abhayā nāma sā disā,
anya-e0903n0:72: Yassa etādisaṃ yānaṃ, itthiyā purisassa vā;
anya-e0903n0:73: Sa ve etena yānena, nibbānasseva santike”ti.
anya-e0903n0:76: Vanantaṃ mohanaṃ nāma, kathaṃ yātrā bhavissati–
anya-e0903n0:78: Pucchā – jarāsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:79: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ devataṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññatarā bhante devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca–
anya-e0903n0:80: “Kiṃ su yāva jarā sādhu, kiṃ su sādhu patiṭṭhitaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:81: Kiṃ su narānaṃ ratanaṃ, kiṃ su corehi dūhara”nti.
anya-e0903n0:83: “Sīlaṃ yāva jarā sādhu, saddhā sādhu patiṭṭhitā;
anya-e0903n0:84: Paññā narānaṃ ratanaṃ, puññaṃ corehi dūhara”nti.
anya-e0903n0:92_0: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena subrahmasuttaṃ
anya-e0903n0:92_1: kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ katañca bhāsitaṃ. Kīdiso ca tattha dhammapaṭiggāhakassa
anya-e0903n0:93: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante subrahmadevaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Subrahmā bhante devaputto maraṇabhayabhīto bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca–
anya-e0903n0:96: Sace atthi anutrastaṃ, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito”ti–
anya-e0903n0:100_0: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ. Desanāpariyosāne ca bhante subrahmassa devaputtassa
anya-e0903n0:100_1: tasmiṃyeva āsane virajaṃ vītamalaṃ dhammacakkhuṃ udapādi, “yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ,
anya-e0903n0:101: Niccaṃ utrastamidaṃ cittaṃ, niccaṃ ubbiggamidaṃ mano;
anya-e0903n0:103: Sace atthi anutrasta, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito-hu–
anya-e0903n0:107: Pucchā – rohitassasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:108_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rohitassaṃ devaputtaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rohitasso
anya-e0903n0:108_1: bhante devaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “yattha nu kho bhante na jāyati na jīyati
anya-e0903n0:108_2: na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati, sakkā nu kho so bhante gamanena lokassa anto ñātuṃ
anya-e0903n0:108_3: vā daṭṭhuṃ vā pāpuṇituṃ vā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yattha kho āvuso na jāyati
anya-e0903n0:108_4: na jīyati na mīyati na cavati na upapajjati, nāhaṃ taṃ gamanena lokassa antaṃ ñāteyyaṃ
anya-e0903n0:108_5: aṭṭheyyaṃ patteyyanti vadāmī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:111: Pucchā – daharasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:112_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃ pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rājā
anya-e0903n0:112_1: bhante pasenadi kosalo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṃ
anya-e0903n0:112_2: sammodi, ekamantaṃ nisinno kho bhante rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0903n0:112_3: “bhavampi no gotamo ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho’ti paṭijānātī”ti. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:112_4: bhante vatthusmiṃ “yañhi taṃ mahārāja sammā vadamānovadeyya ‘anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ
anya-e0903n0:112_5: abhisambuddho’ti, mameva taṃ sammā vadamāno vadeyyā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:113: Tasmā hi paṇḍito poso, sampassaṃ atthamattano;
anya-e0903n0:117: Pucchā – attarakkhitasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:118_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃyeva pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rājā
anya-e0903n0:118_1: bhante pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “idha mayhaṃ bhante rahogatassa
anya-e0903n0:118_2: paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādī”ti evamādikaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. Bhagavā
anya-e0903n0:118_3: ca bhante evametaṃ mahārāja evametaṃ mahārājāti evamādinā vibhajitvā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:119: Kāyena saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu vācāya saṃvaro;
anya-e0903n0:120: Manasā saṃvaro sādhu, sādhu, sabbattha saṃvaro;
anya-e0903n0:123: Pucchā – appakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:124_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃyeva pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rājā
anya-e0903n0:124_1: bhante pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “idha mayhaṃ bhante rahogatassa
anya-e0903n0:124_2: paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi appakā te sattā lokasmiṃ, ye uḷāre
anya-e0903n0:124_3: uḷāre bhoge labhitvā na ceva majjanti na ca pamajjanti, na ca kāmesu gedhaṃ āpajjantī”ti
anya-e0903n0:124_4: evamādikaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. Bhagavā ca bhante “evametaṃ mahārāja evametaṃ mahārājā”ti
anya-e0903n0:126: Pucchā – mallikāsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:127_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃyeva pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rājā
anya-e0903n0:127_1: bhante pasenadi kosalo mallikaṃ deviṃ etadavoca “atthi nu kho te mallike kocañño
anya-e0903n0:127_2: attanā piyataro”ti. Tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ sabbādisā anuparigamma cetasāti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:128: Sabbā disā anuparigamma cetasā, nevajjhagā piyataramattanā kvaci. Evaṃ piyo puthu attā paresaṃ, tasmā na hiṃse paramattakāmo–
anya-e0903n0:130: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena sattajaṭilasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:131_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃ pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rājā
anya-e0903n0:131_1: bhante pasenadi kosalo acirapakkantesu sattasu ca jaṭilesu sattasu ca nigaṇṭhesu
anya-e0903n0:131_2: sattasu ca acelakesu sattasu ca ekasāṭakesu sattasu ca paribbājakesu yena bhagavā
anya-e0903n0:131_3: tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi, ekamantaṃ
anya-e0903n0:131_4: nisinno kho bhante rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ye te bhante loke
anya-e0903n0:131_5: arahanto vā arahattamaggaṃ vā samāpannā, ete tesaṃ aññatarā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:131_6: “dujjānaṃ kho etaṃ mahārāja tayā gihinā kāmabhoginā puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvasantena
anya-e0903n0:131_7: kāsiṇacandanaṃ paccanubhontena mālāgandhavilepanaṃ dhārayantena jātarūparajataṃ sādiyantena
anya-e0903n0:131_8: “ime vā arahanto, ime vā arahattamaggaṃ samāpannā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:132: Na vaṇṇarūpena naro sujāno, na vissase ittaradassanena;
anya-e0903n0:135: Caranti loke parivārachannā, anto asuddhā bahisobhamānā-hū
anya-e0903n0:137: Pucchā – pañcarājasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:138_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃyeva pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rājā
anya-e0903n0:138_1: bhante pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kiṃ nu kho bhante kāmānaṃ agga”nti.
anya-e0903n0:138_2: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “manāpapariyantaṃ khvāhaṃ mahārāja pañcasu kāmaguṇesu agganti
anya-e0903n0:139: Idha bhante amhākaṃ pañcannaṃ rājūnaṃ pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappitānaṃ samaṅgībhūtānaṃ paricārayamānānaṃ ayamantarākathā udapādiṃ ‘kiṃ nu kho kāmānaṃ agga’nti–
anya-e0903n0:140: Padumaṃ yathā kokanadaṃ sugandhaṃ, pāto siyā phullamavītagandhaṃ. Aṅgīrasaṃ passa virocamānaṃ, tapantamādiccamivantalikkhe–
anya-e0903n0:142: Pucchā – dutiyaaputtakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:143_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃyeva pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Rājā
anya-e0903n0:143_1: bhante pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “idha bhante sāvatthiyaṃ seṭṭhi
anya-e0903n0:143_2: gahapati kālaṅkato, tamahaṃ aputtakaṃ sāpateyyaṃ rājantepuraṃ atiharitvā āgacchāmī”ti
anya-e0903n0:143_3: evamādikaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. Bhagavā ca bhante “evametaṃ mahārāja, evametaṃ mahārāja,
anya-e0903n0:143_4: bhūtapubbaṃ so mahārāja seṭṭhi gahapati taggarasikhiṃ nāma paccekasambuddhaṃ piṇḍapātena
anya-e0903n0:143_5: paṭipādesī”ti evamādinā tassa seṭṭhissa gahapatissa atītaṃ vatthuṃ āharitvā pariyosāne
anya-e0903n0:144: Dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ, pariggahaṃ vāpi yadatthi kiñci,
anya-e0903n0:145: Dāsā kammakarā pessā, ye cassa anujīvino.
anya-e0903n0:148: Tañhi tassa sakaṃ hoti, taṃva ādāya gacchati;
anya-e0903n0:154: Pucchā – tapokammasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā jinena kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:155: Vissajjanā – uruvelāyaṃ bhante māraṃ pāpimantaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante pāpimā bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
anya-e0903n0:161: Sīlaṃ samādhi paññañca, maggaṃ bodhāya bhāvayaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:162: Pattosmi paramaṃ suddhiṃ, nihato tvamasi antakā”ti.
anya-e0903n0:163: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā jinena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:164: Tapokammā apakkamma, ye na sujjhanti māṇavā;
anya-e0903n0:169: Pucchā – hatthirājavaṇṇasuttaṃ panāvuso bhavagatā jinena kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:170_0: Vissajjanā – uruvelāyaṃ bhante mārakaṃyeva pāpimantaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante
anya-e0903n0:170_1: pāpimā bhagavato bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo mahantaṃ hatthirājavaṇṇaṃ
anya-e0903n0:173: Alaṃ te tena pāpima, nihato tvamasi antakā”ti.
anya-e0903n0:174: Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā jinena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:176: Alaṃ te tena pāpima, nihato tvamasi antaka –
anya-e0903n0:179: Pucchā – idāni āvuso bhikkhunī saṃyuttaṃ pucchāmi, yaṃ tassa bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa sāvikāhi therīhi attano
anya-e0903n0:180_0: Ca buddhasāsanassa ca yathābhūtaṃ guṇaṃ pakāsetvā bhāsitaṃ. Tatthāvuso paṭhamaṃ porāṇakehi
anya-e0903n0:180_1: mahākassapādīhi dhammasaṃgāhakehi theravarehi saṃgītaṃ āḷavikāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0903n0:181_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante māraṃ pāpimantaṃ ārabbha āḷavikāya bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:181_1: Māro bhante pāpimā āḷavikāya bhikkhuniyā bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo
anya-e0903n0:181_2: vivekamhā cāvetukāmo āḷavikaṃ bhikkhuniṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n0:186: Pamattabandhu pāpima, na tvaṃ jānāsi taṃ padaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:188: Yaṃ tvaṃ kāmaratiṃ brūsi, arahi mayha sā ahū”ti.
anya-e0903n0:189: Evaṃ kho bhante āḷavikāya bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:190: Natthi nissaraṇaṃ loke, kiṃ vivekena kāhasi;
anya-e0903n0:192: Atthi nissaraṇaṃ loke, paññāya me suphussitaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:193: Pamattabandhu pāpima, na tvaṃ jānāsi taṃ padaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:195: Yaṃ tvaṃ kāmaratiṃ brūsi, arati mayha sā ahu–
anya-e0903n0:197: Pucchā – somāsuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:198_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante andhavane māraṃ pāpimantaṃ ārabbha somāya bhikkhuniyā
anya-e0903n0:198_1: bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante pāpimā somāya bhikkhuniyā bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo
anya-e0903n0:198_2: samādhimhā cāvetukāmo somaṃ bhikkhuniṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
anya-e0903n0:204: Yassa nūna siyā evaṃ, itthāhaṃ purisoti vā;
anya-e0903n0:205: Kiñci vā pana aññasmi, taṃ māro vattumarahatī”ti.
anya-e0903n0:206: Evaṃ kho bhante somāya bhikkhuniyā ariyasāvikāya bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:207: Yaṃ taṃ isīhi pattabbaṃ, ṭhānaṃ durabhisambhavaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:209: Itthi bhāvo kiṃ kayirā, cittamhi susamāhite;
anya-e0903n0:210: Ñāṇamhi vatta mānamhi, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
anya-e0903n0:211: Yassa nūna siyā evaṃ, itthāhaṃ purisoti vā;
anya-e0903n0:212: Kiñci vā pana aññasmi, taṃ māro vattumarahati.
anya-e0903n0:214: Pucchā – tatthāvuso kisāgotamīsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:215_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante andhavane māraṃ pāpimantaṃ ārabbha kisāgotamiyā
anya-e0903n0:215_1: bhikkhuniyā theriyā bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante pāpimā kisāgotamiyā bhikkhuniyā bhayaṃ
anya-e0903n0:215_2: chambhitattaṃ lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo samādhimhā cāvetukāmo kisāgotamiṃ bhikkhuniṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n0:220: Na socāmi na rodāmi, na taṃ bhāyāmi āvuso.
anya-e0903n0:223: Evaṃ kho bhante kisāgotamiyā bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:224: Kiṃ nu tvaṃ mataputtāva, ekamāsi rudammukhī;
anya-e0903n0:227: Na socāmi na rodāmi, na taṃ bhāyāmi āvuso.
anya-e0903n0:231: Pucchā – tatthāvuso porāṇehi saṃgītikāramahātheravarehi saṃgītaṃ uppalavaṇṇasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:232_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante andhavane māraṃ pāpimantaṃ ārabbha uppalavaṇṇāya
anya-e0903n0:232_1: bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante pāpimā uppalavaṇṇāya bhikkhuniyā bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ
anya-e0903n0:232_2: lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo samādhimhā cāvetukāmo uppalavaṇṇaṃ bhikkhuniṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n0:233: “Supupphitaggaṃ upagamma bhikkhuni, ekā tuvaṃ tiṭṭhasi sālamūle. Na catthi te dutiyā vaṇṇadhātu, bāle na tvaṃ bhāyasi dhuttakāna”nti.
anya-e0903n0:239: Esā antaradhāyāmi, kucchiṃ vā pavisāmi te;
anya-e0903n0:243: Evaṃ kho bhante uppalavaṇṇāya bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:245: Pucchā – tatthāvuso cālāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:246_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante andhavane māraṃyeva pāpimantaṃ ārabbha cālāya bhikkhuniyā
anya-e0903n0:246_1: ariyasāvikāya bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante pāpimā cālaṃ bhikkhuniṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca
anya-e0903n0:246_2: “kiṃ nu tvaṃ bhikkhuni na rocesī”ti. Jātiṃ khvāhaṃ āvuso na rocemī”ti.
anya-e0903n0:247: Kiṃ nu jātiṃ na rocesi, jāto kāmāni bhuñjati;
anya-e0903n0:248: Ko nu taṃ idamādapayi, jātiṃ mā roca bhikkhunīti.
anya-e0903n0:250: Jātassa maraṇaṃ hoti, jāto dukkhāni phussati;
anya-e0903n0:251: Bandhaṃ vadhaṃ pariklesaṃ, tasmā jātiṃ na rocaye.
anya-e0903n0:254: Ye ca rūpūpagā sattā, ye ca arūpaṭṭhāyino;
anya-e0903n0:256: Evaṃ kho bhante cālāya bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:257: Kiṃ nu jātiṃ na rocesi, jāto kāmāni bhuñjati;
anya-e0903n0:258: Ko nu taṃ idamādapayi, jātiṃ mā roca bhikkhunī.
anya-e0903n0:259: Jātassa maraṇaṃ hoti, jāto dukkhāni phussati;
anya-e0903n0:260: Bandhaṃ vadhaṃ pariklesaṃ, tasmā jātiṃ na rocaye.
anya-e0903n0:264: Pucchā – tatthāvuso selāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:265_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante māraṃyeva pāpimantaṃ ārabbbha selāya bhikkhuniyā
anya-e0903n0:265_1: ariyasāvikāya bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante pāpimā selāya bhikkhuniyā bhayaṃ chambhitattaṃ
anya-e0903n0:265_2: lomahaṃsaṃ uppādetukāmo samādhimhā cāvetukāmo selaṃ bhikkhuniṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n0:266: Kenidaṃ pakataṃ bimbaṃ, kvanu bimbassa kārako;
anya-e0903n0:267: Kvanu bimbaṃ samuppannaṃ, kvanu bimbaṃ nirujjhatīti.
anya-e0903n0:269: Nayidaṃ attakataṃ bimbaṃ, nayidaṃ parakataṃ aghaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:272: Kenidaṃ pakataṃ bimbaṃ, kvanu bimbassa kārako;
anya-e0903n0:273: Kvanu bimbaṃ samuppannaṃ, kvanu bimbaṃ nirujjhati-hu–
anya-e0903n0:274: Nayidaṃ attakataṃ bimbaṃ, nayidaṃ parakataṃ aghaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:277: Pucchā – tatthāvuso porāṇakehi mahākassapādīhi dhammasaṃgāhakatheravarehi saṃgītaṃ vajirāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:278: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante māraṃ pāpimantaṃ ārabbha vajirāya theriyā bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ. Māro bhante pāpimā purimanayeneva vajiraṃ bhikkhuniṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n0:279: Kenāyaṃ pakato satto, kuvaṃ sattassa kārako,
anya-e0903n0:280: Kuvaṃ satto samuppanno, kuvaṃ satto nirujjhatīti.
anya-e0903n0:282: Kiṃ nu sattoti paccesi, māradiṭṭhigataṃ nu te;
anya-e0903n0:284: Yathā hi aṅgasambhārā, hoti saddo ratho iti;
anya-e0903n0:285: Evaṃ khandhesu santesu, hoti sattoti sammuti.
anya-e0903n0:286: Dukkhameva hi sambhoti, dukkhaṃ tiṭṭhati veti ca,
anya-e0903n0:287: Nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṃ dukkhā nirujjhatīti.
anya-e0903n0:288: Evaṃ kho bhante vajirāya bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:290: Kuvaṃ satto samuppanno, kuvaṃ satto nirujjhati-hu–
anya-e0903n0:291: Kiṃ nu sattoti paccesi, māra diṭṭhigataṃ nu te;
anya-e0903n0:295: Pucchā – brahmasaṃyutte āvuso porāṇehi mahākassapatherādīhi dhammasaṃgāhakatheravarehi dutiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ gāravasuttaṃ kattha kathañca samuppannaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:296_0: Vissajjanā – uruvelāyaṃ bhante samuppannaṃ. Bhagavā bhante uruvelāyaṃ viharati najjā
anya-e0903n0:296_1: nerañjarāya tīre ajapālanigrodhamūle paṭhamābhisambuddho. Atha kho bhagavato rahogatassa
anya-e0903n0:296_2: paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi “dukkhaṃ kho agāravo viharati appatisso,
anya-e0903n0:296_3: kaṃ nu khvāhaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya vihareyya”nti.
anya-e0903n0:297_0: Atha kho bhante bhagavato etadahosi “aparipuṇṇassa kho sīlakkhandhassa pāripūriyā
anya-e0903n0:297_1: aññaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya vihareyyuṃ, na kho
anya-e0903n0:297_2: panāhaṃ passāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya
anya-e0903n0:298: Brāhmaṇaṃ vā, yamahaṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya vihareyyuṃ.
anya-e0903n0:302_0: Aparipuṇṇassa kho vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhassa pāripūriyā aññaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ
anya-e0903n0:302_1: vā sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upaninissāya vihareyyaṃ. Na kho panāhaṃ passāmi sadevake
anya-e0903n0:302_2: loke samārake sabrahmake sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiyā pajāya sadevamanussāya attanā vimuttiñāṇadassanasampannataraṃ
anya-e0903n0:302_3: aññaṃ samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā, yamahaṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā upanissāya vihareyyaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:302_4: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ yvāyaṃ dhammo mayā abhisambuddho, tameva dhammaṃ sakkatvā garuṃ katvā
anya-e0903n0:302_5: upanissāya vihareyya”nti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavato cetaso parivitakkavasena uppannaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:303: Ye ca atītā sambuddhā, ye ca buddhā anāgatā;
anya-e0903n0:310: Pucchā- tatthāvuso porāṇakehi mahākassapādīhi dhammasaṃgāhakatheravarehi paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ aññatarabrahmasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:311_0: Vissajjanā – brahmaloke bhante aññataraṃ brahmānaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā mahāmoggallānattherena
anya-e0903n0:311_1: bhāsitaṃ. Aññatarassa bhante brahmuno evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ uppannaṃ hoti
anya-e0903n0:311_2: “natthi so samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā, yo idha āgaccheyyā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ–
anya-e0903n0:312: Ajjāpi te āvuso sā diṭṭhi, yā te diṭṭhi pure ahu;
anya-e0903n0:314: Evaṃ kho bhante āyasmatā mahāmoggallānattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:315: Ajjāpi te āvuso sā diṭṭhi, yā te diṭṭhi pure ahu;
anya-e0903n0:317: Na me mārisa sā diṭṭhi, yā me diṭṭhi pure ahu;
anya-e0903n0:319: Svāhaṃ ajja kathaṃ vajjaṃ, ahaṃ niccomhi sassato hu–
anya-e0903n0:323: Pucchā – tatthāvuso aruṇavatīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:324_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:324_1: rājā ahosi aruṇavā nāma. Rañño kho pana bhikkhave aruṇavato aruṇavatī nāma rājadhānī
anya-e0903n0:324_2: ahosī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā aruṇavatī suttaṃ bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:331: Pucchā – brāhmaṇasaṃyutte āvuso paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ dhanañjānīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:332: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante bhāradvājagottaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Bhāradvājagotto bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
anya-e0903n0:345: Kiṃ su chetvā sukhaṃseti, kiṃ su chetvā na socati;
anya-e0903n0:347: Pucchā – imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bhāradvājagotto brāhmaṇo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi, kīvattakañca atthaṃ sampādesi.
anya-e0903n0:348_0: Vissajjanā – imañca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bhāradvājagotto brāhmaṇo “abhikkantaṃ
anya-e0903n0:348_1: bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ bho gotama, seyyathāpi bho gotama nikkujjitaṃ vā ukkujjeyya,

anya-e0903n0:348_3: dhāreyya cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī”ti evamādinā bhante imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno
anya-e0903n0:348_4: pasannākāramakāsi. Imañca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā bhāradvājagotto brāhmaṇo
anya-e0903n0:348_5: bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ upasampadaṃ yācitvā acirūpasampanno yāva arahattaṃ sampādesi.
anya-e0903n0:350: Pucchā – akkosakabhāradvājasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:351_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante akkosakabhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Akkosakabhāradvājo
anya-e0903n0:351_1: bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā asabbhāhi pharusāhi vācāhi bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0903n0:351_2: akkosati paribhāsati. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “taṃ kiṃ maññasi brāhmaṇa, api nukho

anya-e0903n0:432_4: Bhagavato ca santike “labheyyāhaṃ bhoto gotamassa santike pabbajaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampada”nti
anya-e0903n0:432_5: evamādinā pabbajjaṃ upasampadaṃ yācitvā acirūpasampanno yāva arahattā mahantaṃ visesaṃ sampādesi.
anya-e0903n0:434: Pucchā – tatthāvuso ekādasamaṃ mahākassapādīhi porāṇadhammasaṃgāhakatherehi saṃgītaṃ kasibhāradvājasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:435: Vissajjanā – magadhesu bhante dakkhiṇāgirismiṃ ekanāḷāyaṃ brāhmaṇagāme kasibhāradvājaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Kasibhāradvājo bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi.
anya-e0903n0:436: “Kassako paṭijānāsi, na ca passāmi te kasiṃ. Kassako pucchito brūhi, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ kasi”nti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ–
anya-e0903n0:437: “Saddhā bījaṃ tapo vuṭṭhi, paññā me yuganaṅgalaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:438: Hirī īsā mano yottaṃ, sati me phālapācanaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:440: Saccaṃ karomi niddānaṃ, soraccaṃ me pamocanaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:442: Gacchati anivattantaṃ, yattha gantvā na socati.
anya-e0903n0:443: Evamesā kasī kaṭṭhā, sā hoti amatapphalā;
anya-e0903n0:446: Kassako paṭijānāsi, na ca passāmi te kasiṃ;
anya-e0903n0:447: Kassako pucchito brūhi, kathaṃ jānemu taṃ kasiṃ.
anya-e0903n0:448: Saddhā bījaṃ tapo vuṭṭhi, paññā me yuganaṅgalaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:449: Hirī īsā mano yottaṃ, sati me phālapācanaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:450: Pucchā – imañca panāvuso dhammadesanaṃ sutvā so kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno kīdisaṃ pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0903n0:451_0: Vissajjanā – imañca pana bhante dhammadesanaṃ sutvā kasibhāradvājo brāhmaṇo “abhikkantaṃ
anya-e0903n0:451_1: bho gotama, abhikkantaṃ bho gotamā”tievamādinā imasmiṃ dhammavinaye pasanno pasannākāramakāsi.
anya-e0903n0:452: Seyyathāpi bho gotama ukkujjitaṃ vā nikkujjeyya.
anya-e0903n0:454: Pucchā – udayasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:455_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante udayaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Udayo bhante brāhmaṇo
anya-e0903n0:455_1: bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “pakaṭṭhakoyaṃ samaṇo gotamo punappunaṃ āgacchatī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ–
anya-e0903n0:456: Punappunañceva vapanti bījaṃ, punappunaṃ vassati devarājā;
anya-e0903n0:457: Punappunaṃ khettaṃ kasanti kassakā, punappunaṃ dhaññamupeti raṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:459: Punappunaṃ ceva vapanti bījaṃ, punappunaṃ vassati deva rājā;
anya-e0903n0:460: Punappunaṃ khettaṃ kasanti kassakā, punappunaṃ dhaññamupeti raṭṭhaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:461: Punappunaṃ yācakā yācayanti, punappunaṃ dānapatī dadanti;
anya-e0903n0:462: Punappunaṃ dānapatī daditvā, punappunaṃ saggamupeti ṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:463: Punappunaṃ khīranikā duhanti, punappunaṃ vaccho upeti mātaraṃ;
anya-e0903n0:464: Punappunaṃ kilamati phandati ca, punappunaṃ gabbhamupeti mando.
anya-e0903n0:465: Punappunaṃ jāyati mīyati ca, punappunaṃ sivathikaṃ haranti;
anya-e0903n0:466: Maggañca laddhā apunabbhavāya, na punappunaṃ jāyati bhūripañño-hu–
anya-e0903n0:468: Pucchā – mātuposakasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:469_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante mātuposakaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Mātuposako
anya-e0903n0:469_1: bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ahañhi bho gotama dhammena bhikkhaṃ pariyesāmi,
anya-e0903n0:469_2: dhammena bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā mātāpitaro posemi, kaccāhaṃ bho gotama evaṃkārī kiccakārī
anya-e0903n0:469_3: homī”ti, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “taggha tvaṃ brāhmaṇa evaṃkārī kiccakārī hosi,
anya-e0903n0:469_4: yo kho brāhmaṇa dhammena bhikkhaṃ pariyesati, dhammena bhikkhaṃ pariyesitvā mātāpitaro
anya-e0903n0:469_5: poseti, bahuṃ so puññaṃ pasavatī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitā.
anya-e0903n0:470: Yo mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā, macco dhammena posati;
anya-e0903n0:472: Idheva naṃ pasaṃsanti, pecca sagge pamodati–
anya-e0903n0:474: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena brāhmaṇasaṃyutte khomadussasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:475_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante khomadusse nāma sakyānaṃ nigame khomadussake brāhmaṇagahapatike
anya-e0903n0:475_1: ārabbha bhāsita, khomadussakā bhante brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ “ke
anya-e0903n0:475_2: ca muṇḍakā samaṇakā, ke ca sabhādhammaṃ jānissantī”ti.
anya-e0903n0:478: Santo na te ye na vadanti dhammaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:483: Santo na te ye na vadanti dhammaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:488: Pucchā – vaṅgīsasaṃyutte panāvuso catutthaṃ saṃṅgītaṃ ānandasuttaṃ katthakaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:489_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ vaṅgīsattheraṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena
anya-e0903n0:489_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmatā bhante vaṅgīso āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n0:495: Saṅkhāre parato passa, dukkhato mā ca attato;
anya-e0903n0:501: Evaṃ kho bhante āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:506: Saṅkhāre paratopassa, dukkhato mā ca attato;
anya-e0903n0:513: Pucchā – tattha āvuso dvādasamaṃ vaṅgīsasuttaṃ kattha kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:514: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmatā vaṅgīsattherena acira arahattappattena vimuttisukhapaṭisaṃvedinā–
anya-e0903n0:517: So me dhamma madesesi, khandhāyatana dhātuyo;
anya-e0903n0:519: Bahunnaṃ vata atthāya, bodhiṃ ajjhagamā muni;
anya-e0903n0:521: Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
anya-e0903n0:522: Tisso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:530: Bahunnaṃ vata atthāya, bodhiṃ ajjhagamā muni;
anya-e0903n0:532: Svāgataṃ vata me āsi, mama buddhassa santike;
anya-e0903n0:533: Tasso vijjā anuppattā, kataṃ buddhassa sāsanaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:538: Pucchā – vanasaṃyutte panāvuso pañcamaṃ saṃgītaṃ ānandasuttaṃ kadā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:539_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante aññatarasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe aciraparinibbute bhagavati āyasmantaṃ
anya-e0903n0:539_1: ānandaṃ ārabbha tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthāya devatāya bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante ānando
anya-e0903n0:539_2: aciraparinibbute bhagavati ativelaṃ gihisaññattibahulo viharati, tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ–
anya-e0903n0:544: Evaṃ kho bhante vanasaṇḍe adhivatthāya devatāya āyasmato ānandattherassa anukampikāya atthakāmāya bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:545: Rukkhamūla gahanaṃ pasakkiya, nibbānaṃ hadayasmiṃ opiya;
anya-e0903n0:546: Jhāya gotama mā pamādo, kiṃ te biḷibiḷikā karissati-hu–
anya-e0903n0:549: Pucchā – yakkhasaṃyutte panāvuso paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ indakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:550_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante indakūṭe pabbate indakassa yakkhassa bhavane indakaṃ
anya-e0903n0:550_1: yakkhaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Indako bhante yakkho attavādo bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n0:557: Abbudā jāyate pesi, pesi nibbattatī ghano;
anya-e0903n0:558: Ghanā pasākhā jāyanti, kesā lomā nakhāpica;
anya-e0903n0:559: Yañcassa bhuñjatī mātā, annaṃ pānañca bhojanaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:563: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena yakkhasaṃyutte āḷavakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:564: Vissajjanā – āḷaviyaṃ bhante āḷavakassa yakkhassa bhavane āḷavakaṃ yakkhaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āḷavako bhante yakkho bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n0:575: Na khvāhaṃ taṃ āvuso nikkhamissāmi, yaṃ te karaṇīyaṃ, taṃ karohi,
anya-e0903n0:576: Pañhaṃ taṃ samaṇa pucchissāmi, sace me na byākarissasi, cittaṃ vā te khipissāmi, hadayaṃ vā te phālessāmi, pādesu vā gahetvā pāragaṅgāya khipissāmi–
anya-e0903n0:577: Kiṃ sūkha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ, kiṃ su suciṇṇaṃ sukhamāvahāti;
anya-e0903n0:578: Kiṃ su have sādubharaṃ rasānaṃ, kathaṃ jīviṃ jīvitamāhu seṭṭhaṃ–
anya-e0903n0:579: Saddhīdha vittaṃ purisassa seṭṭhaṃ, dhammo suciṇṇo sukhamāvahāti;
anya-e0903n0:580: Saccaṃ have sādutaraṃ rasānaṃ, paññājīviṃ jīvitamāhu seṭṭhaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:581: Kathaṃsu tarati oghaṃ, kathaṃsu tarati aṇṇavaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:585: Kathaṃsu labhate paññaṃ, kathaṃsu vindate dhanaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:586: Kathaṃsu kittiṃ pappoti, kathaṃ mittāni ganthati;
anya-e0903n0:587: Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, kathaṃ pecca na socati–
anya-e0903n0:591: Saccena kittiṃ pappoti, dadaṃ mittāni ganthati;
anya-e0903n0:592: Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, evaṃ pecca na socati;
anya-e0903n0:594: Saccaṃ dhammo dhiti cāgo, sa ve peccana socati–
anya-e0903n0:597: Pucchā – sakkasaṃyutte panāvuso vatapadasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:598_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha sakkassa bhikkhave devānamindassa
anya-e0903n0:598_1: pubbe manussabhūtassa satta vatapadāni samattāni samādinnāni ahesuṃ, yesaṃ samādinnattā
anya-e0903n0:598_2: sakko sakkattaṃ ajjhagāti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:599: Sakkassa bhikkhave devānamindassa pubbe manussabhūtassa imāni satta vatapadāni samattāni samādinnāni ahesuṃ.
anya-e0903n0:605_0: Pucchā – daliddasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ. Vissajjanā.
anya-e0903n0:605_1: Rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave aññataro puriso
anya-e0903n0:605_2: imasmiṃyeva rājagahe manussadaliddo ahosi manussakapaṇo manussavarāko, so tathāgatappavedite
anya-e0903n0:605_3: dhammavinaye saddhaṃ samādiyi, sīlaṃ, sutaṃ, cāgaṃ, paññaṃ samādiyī”ti evamādinā
anya-e0903n0:609: Pucchā – yajamānasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:610: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Sakko bhante devānamindo bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi–
anya-e0903n0:612: Karotaṃ opadhikaṃ puññaṃ, kattha dinnaṃ mahapphala”nti.
anya-e0903n0:617: Karotaṃ opadhikaṃ puññaṃ, saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ”nti.
anya-e0903n0:620: Karotaṃ opadhitaṃ puññaṃ, kattha dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ–
anya-e0903n0:621: Cattāro ca paṭipannā, cattāro ca phale ṭhitā;
anya-e0903n0:624: Karotaṃ opadhikaṃ puññaṃ, saṅghe dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ–
anya-e0903n0:626: Pucchā – gahaṭṭhavandanāsuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:627: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave sakko devānamindo mātaliṃ saṅgāhakaṃ āmantesī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:628: Taṃ namassanti tevijjā, sabbe bhummāca khattiyā;
anya-e0903n0:630: Athako nāma so yakkho, yaṃ tvaṃ sakka namassasi–
anya-e0903n0:634: Dhammena dāraṃ posenti, te namassāmi mātali.
anya-e0903n0:638: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena nidānavaggasaṃyutte paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ paṭiccasamuppādasuttaṃ kattha taṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:639_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante pañcasate janapadavāsino bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:639_1: Pañcasatā bhante janapadavāsino bhikkhū sabbe ugghāṭitaññuno dhutaṅgadharā āraddhavīriyā
anya-e0903n0:639_2: yuttayogā vipassakā saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ suññataṃ paccayākāradhammadesanaṃ patthayamānā
anya-e0903n0:639_3: bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu. Tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “paṭiccasamuppādaṃ
anya-e0903n0:639_4: vo bhikkhave desessāmi, taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti evamādinā
anya-e0903n0:640_0: Katamo ca bhikkhave paṭiccasamuppādo. Avijjāpaccayā bhikkhave saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā
anya-e0903n0:640_2: evametassa kevalassa dukkhandhassa samudayo hoti. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave paṭiccasamuppādo.
anya-e0903n0:641_0: Avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodho saṅkhāranirodho (peyyāla) jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇaṃ
anya-e0903n0:641_1: sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā nirujjhanti, evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hoti –
anya-e0903n0:643: Pucchā – tatthāvuso dutiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ vibhaṅgasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:644_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante pañcasate janapadavāsino vipañcitaññuno bhikkhū ārabbha
anya-e0903n0:644_1: bhāsitaṃ. Pañcasatā bhante janapadavāsikā bhikkhū vipañcitaññuno dhutaṅgadharā āraddhavīriyā
anya-e0903n0:644_2: yuttayogā vissakā saṇhaṃ sukhumaṃ suññatapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ paccayākāradhammadesanaṃ patthayamānā
anya-e0903n0:644_3: bhagavantaṃ parivāretvā nisīdiṃsu. Tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “paṭicca samuppādaṃ vo bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:644_4: dedessāmi vibhajissāmi, taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasikarotha, bhāsissāmī”ti evamādinā
anya-e0903n0:646: Pucchā – pañcaverabhayasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:647_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha “yato kho gahapati
anya-e0903n0:647_1: ariyasāvakassa pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti, catūhi ca sotāpattiyaṅgehi
anya-e0903n0:647_2: samannāgato hoti, ariyo cassa ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho, so ākaṅkhamāno
anya-e0903n0:647_3: attanāva attānaṃ byākareyya khīṇanirayomi khīṇatiracchānayoni khīṇapettivisayo khīṇāpāyaduggativinipāto,
anya-e0903n0:647_4: sotāpannohamasmi avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyano”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:648: Pucchā – kathañcāvusotattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa pañcannaṃ bhayānaṃ verānaṃ vūpasantatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n0:649_0: Vissajjanā – “katamāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti. Yaṃ gahapati pāṇātipātī
anya-e0903n0:649_1: pāṇātipātapaccayā diṭṭhadhammikampi bhayaṃ veraṃ pasavati, samparāyikampi bhayaṃ
anya-e0903n0:649_2: veraṃ pasavati, cetasikampi dukkhaṃ domanassaṃ paṭisaṃvedayati. Pāṇātipātā ṭiviratassa
anya-e0903n0:649_3: evaṃ taṃ bhayaṃ veraṃ vūpasantaṃ hotī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa
anya-e0903n0:650: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgatatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n0:651_0: Vissajjanā – katamehi catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti. Idha gahapati ariyasāvako
anya-e0903n0:651_1: buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgato hoti “itipiso bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno
anya-e0903n0:651_2: sugato lokavidū anuttaropurisadammasārathi satthādevamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā”ti
anya-e0903n0:651_3: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakassa catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgatatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n0:652: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā ariyasāvakena ariyassa ñāyassa paññāya sudiṭṭhatā suppaṭividdhatā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n0:653_0: Vissajjanā – katamo cassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho. Idha gahapati
anya-e0903n0:653_1: ariyasāvako paṭiccasamuppādaññeva sādhukaṃ yoniso manasi karoti “iti imasmiṃ sati
anya-e0903n0:653_2: idaṃ hoti, imasmiṃ asati idaṃ na hoti, imassuppādā idaṃ uppajjati, imassa nirodhā
anya-e0903n0:653_3: idaṃ nirujjhati, yadidaṃ avijjāpaccayā (peyyāla) evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa
anya-e0903n0:653_4: nirodho hotī”ti, evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā tattha ariyasāvakena ariyassa ñāyassa
anya-e0903n0:654_0: Yato kho gahapati ariyasāvakassa imāni pañca bhayāni verāni vūpasantāni honti. Imehi
anya-e0903n0:654_1: catūhi sotāpattiyaṅgehi samannāgato hoti. Ayañcassa ariyo ñāyo paññāya sudiṭṭho hoti suppaṭividdho–
anya-e0903n0:656: Pucchā – dukkhasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:657: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dukkhassa bhikkhave samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desessāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:658: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā dukkhasamudayo pakāsito.
anya-e0903n0:659_0: Vissajjanā – katamo ca bhikkhave dukkhassa samudayo. Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati
anya-e0903n0:659_1: cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā.
anya-e0903n0:659_2: Ayaṃ kho bhikkhave dukkhassa samudayo. Sotañca paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṃ…pe…
anya-e0903n0:659_3: ghānañca paṭicca gandhe ca…pe… jivhañca paṭicca rase ca…pe… kāyañca paṭicca phoṭṭhabbe
anya-e0903n0:659_4: ca…pe… manañca paṭicca dhamme ca uppajjati manoviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā
anya-e0903n0:659_5: vedanā, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā. Ayaṃ kho bhikkhave dukkhassa samudayoti evaṃkho bhante
anya-e0903n0:660: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā dukkhassa atthaṅgamo pakāsito.
anya-e0903n0:661_0: Vissajjanā – katamo ca bhikkhave dukkhassa atthaṅgamo. Cakkhuñca paṭicca rūpe ca
anya-e0903n0:661_1: uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā vedanā, vedanāpaccayā
anya-e0903n0:661_2: taṇhā, tassāyeva taṇhāya asesavirāganirodhā upādānanirodho upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho,
anya-e0903n0:661_4: nirujjhanti. Evametassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa nirodho hotīti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0903n0:663: Pucchā – puttamaṃsūpamasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:664_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule adhunā pabbajite bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:664_1: Bhagavato ca bhante bhikkhusaṅghassa ca mahālābhasakkāro udapādi, ekacce ca bhante
anya-e0903n0:664_2: bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā kulaputtā āhāraṃ apaccavekkhitvā paribhuñjiṃsu. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:664_3: bhante vatthusmiṃ “cattārome bhikkhave āhārā bhūtānaṃ vā sattānaṃ ṭhitiyā sambhavesīnaṃ
anya-e0903n0:664_4: vā anuggahāya. Katame cattāro kabaḷīkāro āhāro oḷāriko vā sukhumo vā phasso dutiyo
anya-e0903n0:664_5: manosañcetanā tatiyā viññāṇaṃ catuttha”nti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:665: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha kabaḷīkārassa āhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro bhagavatā pakāsito.
anya-e0903n0:666_0: Vissajjanā – seyyathāpi bhikkhave dve jāyampatikā parittaṃ sambalaṃ ādāya kantāramaggaṃ
anya-e0903n0:666_1: paṭipajjeyyuṃ. Tesamassa ekaputtako piyo manāpoti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā
anya-e0903n0:667: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā phassāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro pakāsito.
anya-e0903n0:668_0: Vissajjanā – seyyathāpi bhikkhave gāvī niccammā kuṭṭaṃ ce nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye kuṭṭanissitā
anya-e0903n0:668_1: pāṇā, te naṃ khādeyyuṃ. Rukkhaṃ ce nissāya tiṭṭheyya. Udakaṃ ce nissāya tiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0903n0:668_2: Ākāsaṃ ce nissāya tiṭṭheyya, ye ākāsanissitā pāṇā, te naṃ khādeyyunti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0903n0:668_3: tattha bhagavatā phassassa āhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro vitthāretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0903n0:669: Evameva khvāhaṃ bhikkhave phassāhāro daṭṭhabboti vadāmi.
anya-e0903n0:670: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā manosañcetanāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro pakāsito.
anya-e0903n0:671_0: Vissajjanā – seyyathāpi bhikkhave aṅgārakāsu sādhikaporisā puṇṇā aṅgārānaṃ vītaccikānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:671_1: vītadhūmānaṃ. Atha puriso āgaccheyya jīvitukāmo amaritukāmo sukha kāmo dukkhappaṭikūloti
anya-e0903n0:671_2: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā manosañcetanāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro vitthārena pakāsito.
anya-e0903n0:672: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā viññāṇāhārassa daṭṭhabbākāro pakāsito.
anya-e0903n0:673_0: Vissajjanā – seyyathāpi bhikkhave coraṃ āgucāriṃ gahetvā rañño dasseyyuṃ “ayaṃ te
anya-e0903n0:673_1: devacoro āgucārī, imassa yaṃ icchasi, taṃ daṇḍaṃ paṇehī”ti evamādinā bhante tattha
anya-e0903n0:675: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena susimaparibbājaka suttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:676_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ susimaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante susimo
anya-e0903n0:676_1: yāvatako bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ ahosi kathāsallāpo, taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato ārocesi. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:676_2: vatthusmiṃ “pubbe kho susima dhammaṭṭhitiñāṇaṃ, pacchā nibbāne ñāṇa”nti evamādinā
anya-e0903n0:677: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavā āyasmato susimattherassa sampatiarahattapattassa anuyogavasena paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā uttari dhammadesanaṃ vitthāretvā desesi.
anya-e0903n0:678_0: Vissajjanā – jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇanti susima passasīti. Evaṃ bhante. Bhavapaccayā
anya-e0903n0:678_1: jātīti susima passasīti. Evaṃ bhanteti evamādinā bhante bhagavā tattha āyasmato susimassa
anya-e0903n0:678_2: sampatiarahattapattassa uttaripi anuyogavasena paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā vitthārato dhammaṃ desesi.
anya-e0903n0:679: Tassa me bhante bhagavā accayaṃ accayato paṭiggaṇhātu āyatiṃsaṃvarāya–
anya-e0903n0:682: Pucchā – abhisamayasaṃyutte panāvuso paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ nakhasikhāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:683_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n0:683_1: katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ, yo vāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsuāropito, ayaṃ
anya-e0903n0:686: Pucchā – dhātusaṃyutte panāvuso caṅkamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:687_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dhātusova bhikkhave sattā
anya-e0903n0:687_1: saṃsandanti samenti, hīnādhimuttikā hīnādhimuttikehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti,
anya-e0903n0:687_2: kalyāṇādhimuttikā kalyāṇādhimuttikehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samentī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:689: Pucchā – assaddhasaṃsandanasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:690_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dhātusova bhikkhave sattā
anya-e0903n0:690_1: saṃsandanti samenti, assaddhā assaddhehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti, ahirikā ahirikehi
anya-e0903n0:690_2: saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samenti, anottappino. Appassutā. Kusītā. Muṭṭhassatino. Duppaññā
anya-e0903n0:690_3: duppaññehi saddhiṃ saṃsandanti samentī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:693: Pucchā – anamataggasaṃyutte āvuso dutiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ pathavīsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:694_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:694_1: saṃsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ
anya-e0903n0:694_2: saṃsarataṃ. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave puriso imaṃ mahāpathaviṃ kolaṭṭhimattaṃ kolaṭṭhimattaṃ
anya-e0903n0:694_3: mattikāguḷikaṃ karitvā nikkhipeyya ‘ayaṃ me piyā, tassa me pitu ayaṃ pitā’ti. Apariyādinnāva
anya-e0903n0:694_4: bhikkhave tassa purisassa pitupitaro assu. Athāyaṃ mahāpathavī parikkhayaṃ pariyādānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:694_5: gaccheyya. Taṃ kissahetu, anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave saṃsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyati
anya-e0903n0:694_6: avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhā saṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ” evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:695: Evaṃ dīgharattaṃ vo bhikkhave dukkhaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ tibbaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ byasanaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ kaṭasī vaḍḍhitā.
anya-e0903n0:699: Pucchā – tatthāvuso tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ assusuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:700_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahuleyeva bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n0:700_1: katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ, yaṃ vā vo iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ
anya-e0903n0:700_2: amanāpasampayogā manāpavippayogā kandantānaṃ rodantānaṃ assu passannaṃ paggharitaṃ,
anya-e0903n0:700_3: yaṃ vā catūsu mahāsamuddesu udaka”nti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:702: Pucchā – tatthāvuso chaṭṭhaṃ saṃgītaṃ sāsapasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:703_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññataro bhante
anya-e0903n0:703_1: bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kīvadīgho nu kho bhante kappo”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:703_2: “dīgho kho bhikkhu kappo, so na sukaro saṅkhātuṃ ettakāni vassāni itivā, (peyyāla)
anya-e0903n0:703_3: ettakāni vassasatasahassāni itivāti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:705: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena anamataggasaṃyutte gaṅgāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:706: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante aññataraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññataro bhante brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kīva-
anya-e0903n0:707_0: Bahukā nu kho bho gotama kappā abbhatītā atikkantā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “bahukā
anya-e0903n0:707_1: kho brāhmaṇa kappā abbhatītā atikkantā, te na sukarā saṅkhātuṃ ‘ettakā kappā’ iti
anya-e0903n0:707_2: vā ‘ettakāni kappasatāni’ iti vā ‘ettakāni kappasahassāni’ itivā ‘ettakāni kappasatasahassāni’
anya-e0903n0:707_3: iti vā”ti eva mādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:709: Pucchā – puggalasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:710_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave saṃsāro,
anya-e0903n0:710_1: pubbākoṭi na paññāyati avijjā nīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ
anya-e0903n0:710_2: saṃsarataṃ. Ekapuggalassa bhikkhave kappaṃ sandhāvato saṃsarato siyā evaṃ mahā aṭṭhikaṅkalo
anya-e0903n0:710_3: aṭṭhipuñjo aṭṭhirāsi, yathā yaṃ vepullo pabbato. Sace saṃhārako assa, sambhatañca
anya-e0903n0:712: Pucchā – tatthāvuso duggatasuttañca sukhitasuttañca bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:713_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:713_1: saṃsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ
anya-e0903n0:713_2: saṃsarataṃ. Yaṃ bhikkhave passeyyātha duggataṃ durūpetaṃ, niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ
anya-e0903n0:713_3: ‘amhehipi evarūpaṃ paccanubhūtaṃ iminā dīghena addhunā’ti, yaṃ bhikkhave passeyyātha
anya-e0903n0:714: Niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ, “amhehipi paccanubhūtaṃ iminā dīghena addhunā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:716: Pucchā – tiṃsamattasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:717_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante tiṃsamatte pāveyyake bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṃ
anya-e0903n0:717_1: bhikkhave saṃsāro, pubbākoṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:717_2: sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ. Taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ, yaṃ
anya-e0903n0:717_3: vā vo iminā dīghena addhunā sandhāvataṃ saṃsarataṃ sīsacchinnānaṃ lohitaṃ passannaṃ
anya-e0903n0:717_4: paggharitaṃ, yaṃ vā catūsu mahāsamuddesu udaka”nti evamādinā bhavagatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:719: Pucchā – mātusuttādīni panāvuso chasuttāni bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:720_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “anamataggoyaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:720_1: saṃsāro, pubbā koṭi na paññāyati avijjānīvaraṇānaṃ sattānaṃ taṇhāsaṃyojanānaṃ sandhāvataṃ
anya-e0903n0:720_2: saṃsarataṃ. Na so bhikkhave satto sulabharūpo, yo na mātābhūtapubbo iminā dīghena
anya-e0903n0:720_3: addhunā. Yo na pitābhūtapubbo. Yo na bhātābhūtapubbo. Yo na bhaginibhūtapubbo. Yo
anya-e0903n0:720_4: na puttabhūtapubbo. Yo na dhītābhūtapubbo iminā dīghena addhunā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:723: Pucchā – kassapasaṃyutte panāvuso candūpamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:724_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “candūpamā bhikkhave kulāni
anya-e0903n0:724_1: upasaṅkamatha apakasseva kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā. Seyyathāpi
anya-e0903n0:724_2: bhikkhave puriso jarudapānaṃ vā olokeyya pabbatavisamaṃ vā nadīviduggaṃ vā apakasseva
anya-e0903n0:724_3: kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ. Evameva kho bhikkhave candūpamā kulāni upasaṅkamatha apakasseva
anya-e0903n0:724_4: kāyaṃ apakassa cittaṃ niccanavakā kulesu appagabbhā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:725: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave, kathaṃ rūpā bhikkhu arahati kulāni upasaṅkamituṃ.
anya-e0903n0:726: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā parisuddhāparisuddha dhammadesanaṃ dassetvā bhikkhūnaṃ ovādo dinno.
anya-e0903n0:727_0: Vissajjanā – “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave, kathaṃ rūpassa bhikkhuno aparisuddhā dhammadesanā
anya-e0903n0:727_1: hoti, kathaṃ rūpassa bhikkhuno parisuddhā dhammadesanā hotī”ti evamādinā parisuddhāparisuddhadhammadesanā
anya-e0903n0:727_2: vitthārato dassetvā “kassapena vā hi vo bhikkhave ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso,
anya-e0903n0:727_3: ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabba”nti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavato bhikkhūnaṃ ovādo dinno.
anya-e0903n0:728: Yo hi koci bhikkhave bhikkhu evaṃcitto paresaṃ dhammaṃ deseti “aho vata me dhammaṃ suṇeyyuṃ, sutvā ca pana dhammaṃ pasīdeyyuṃ, pasannā ca me pasannākāraṃ kareyyuṃ–
anya-e0903n0:729: Svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehi passiko opaneyyiko paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhi–
anya-e0903n0:730: Kassapena vā hi vo bhikkhave ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso, ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ–
anya-e0903n0:732: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena kassapasaṃyutte catutthaṃ kulūpakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:733_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n0:733_1: kathaṃ rūpo bhikkhu arahati kulūpako hotuṃ, kathaṃ rūpo bhikkhu na arahati kulūpako
anya-e0903n0:734: Kassapena vā hi vo bhikkhave ovadissāmi yo vā panassa kassapasadiso, ovaditehi ca pana vo tathattāya paṭipajjitabbaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:736: Pucchā – tatthevāvuso bhagavatā dutiya ovādasuttaṃ kattha kena saddhiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:737_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmatā mahākassapena saddhiṃ “ovada kassapa bhikkhū,
anya-e0903n0:737_1: karohi kassapa bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ, ahaṃ vā kassapa bhikkhū ovadeyyaṃ tvaṃ
anya-e0903n0:737_2: vā, ahaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ kareyyaṃ tvaṃ vā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:738: Yassa kassaci bhante saddhā natthi kusalesu dhammesu, hirī natthi. Ottappaṃ natthi. Vīriyaṃ natthi. Paññā natthi kusalesu dhammesu.
anya-e0903n0:740: Pucchā – tatthevāvuso bhagavatā tatiyaovādasuttaṃ kattha kena saddhiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:741_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmatāyeva mahākassapena saddhiṃ “ovada kassapa bhikkhū.
anya-e0903n0:741_1: Karohi kassapa bhikkhūnaṃ dhammiṃ kathaṃ, ahaṃ vā kassapa bhikkhū ovadeyyaṃ tvaṃ
anya-e0903n0:741_2: vā. Ahaṃ vā bhikkhūnaṃ dhammaṃ kathaṃ kareyyaṃ tvaṃ vā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:742: Dubbacā kho bhante etarahi bhikkhū dovacassakaraṇehi dhammehi samannāgatā akkhamā appadakkhiṇaggāhino anusāsaniṃ–
anya-e0903n0:744: Pucchā – tatthevāvuso bhagavatā pariyosānaṃ saddhammappatirūpakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:745_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃyeva mahākassapaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n0:745_1: bhante mahākassapo bhagavantaṃ etadevoca “ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo, yena
anya-e0903n0:745_2: pubbe appatarāni ceva sikkhāpadāni ahesuṃ, bahutarā ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahiṃsu.
anya-e0903n0:745_3: Ko pana bhante hetu ko paccayo, yenetarahi bahutarāni ceva sakkhāpadāni appatarā
anya-e0903n0:745_4: ca bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “evañcetaṃ kassapa hoti
anya-e0903n0:745_5: sattesu hāyamānesu saddhamme antaradhāyamāne bahutarāniceva sikkhāpadāni honti, appatarāca
anya-e0903n0:745_6: bhikkhū aññāya saṇṭhahantī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:748: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena lābhasakkāraṃyutte pañcamaṃ saṃgītaṃ mīḷhakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:749_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko
anya-e0903n0:749_1: pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya. Seyyathāpi bhikkhave mīḷhakā
anya-e0903n0:749_2: gūthādī gūthapūrā puṇṇā gūthassa, purato cassa mahāgūthapuñjo, sā tena aññā mīḷhakā
anya-e0903n0:749_3: atimaññeyya “ahamhi gūthādī gūthapūrā puṇṇā gūthassa, purato ca myāyaṃ mahāgūthapuñjo”ti
anya-e0903n0:750: Taṃ hi tassa bhikkhave moghapurisassa hoti dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya.
anya-e0903n0:752_0: Tasmātiha bhikkhave evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ, “uppannaṃ lābhasakkārasi lokaṃ pajahissāma,
anya-e0903n0:752_1: na ca no uppanno lābhasakkārasiloko cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassabhī”ti, evañhi kho bhikkhave sikkhitabbaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:754: Pucchā – tattho āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakehi saṃgītaṃ ekaputtakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbhaṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:755_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko
anya-e0903n0:755_1: kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya, saddhā bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:755_2: upāsikā ekaputtakaṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ evaṃ sammāāyācamānā āyāceyya tādiso tāta bhavāhi,
anya-e0903n0:755_3: yādiso citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:756: Esā bhikkhave tulā etaṃ pamāṇaṃ mama sāvakānaṃ upāsakānaṃ yadidaṃ citto ca gahapati hatthako ca āḷavako.
anya-e0903n0:757: Sace kho tvaṃ tāta agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajasi, tādiso tāta bhavāhi, yādisā sāriputtamoggallānā.
anya-e0903n0:758: Mā ca kho tvaṃ tāta sekhaṃ appattamānasaṃ lābhasakkārasiloko anupāpuṇātu–
anya-e0903n0:759: Evaṃ dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya.
anya-e0903n0:761: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāyakehi saṃgītaṃ ekadhītusuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:762_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “dāruṇo bhikkhave lābhasakkārasiloko
anya-e0903n0:762_1: kaṭuko pharuso antarāyiko anuttarassa yogakkhemassa adhigamāya. Saddhā bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:762_2: upāsikā ekaṃ dhītaraṃ piyaṃ manāpaṃ evaṃ sammā āyācamānā āyāceyya ‘tādisā ayye bhavāhi,
anya-e0903n0:762_3: yādisā khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca nandamātā’ti. Esā bhikkhave tulā etaṃ
anya-e0903n0:762_4: pamāṇaṃ mama sāvikānaṃ upāsikānaṃ, yadidaṃ khujjuttarā ca upāsikā veḷukaṇḍakiyā ca
anya-e0903n0:763: Sace kho tvaṃ ayye agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajasi, bhādisā ayye bhavāhi, yādisā khemā ca bhikkhunī uppalavaṇṇā ca–
anya-e0903n0:766: Pucchā – rāhulasaṃyuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:767_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante
anya-e0903n0:767_1: rāhulo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu,
anya-e0903n0:767_2: yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyya”nti,
anya-e0903n0:767_3: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “taṃ kiṃ maññasi rāhula, cakkhuniccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti. Aniccaṃ
anya-e0903n0:767_4: bhante. Yaṃ panāniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vāti. Dukkhaṃ bhante. Yaṃ panāniccaṃ
anya-e0903n0:767_5: dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ ‘etaṃ mama, eso hamasmi,
anya-e0903n0:767_6: eso me attā’ti. No hetaṃ bhante”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:770: Pucchā – lakkhaṇasaṃyutte panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakattherehi paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ aṭṭhisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:771_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṃ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:771_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavatā sammukhe āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:771_2: etadavoca “idhāyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṃ padese
anya-e0903n0:771_3: sitaṃ pātvākāsi, ko nu kho āvuso moggallāna hetu, ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti.
anya-e0903n0:771_4: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno “idhāhaṃ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ
anya-e0903n0:771_5: aṭṭhikasaṅkhalikaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantiṃ”ti evamādinā ārocesi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:771_6: “cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti, ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti,
anya-e0903n0:771_7: yatrahi nāma sāvako evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṃ vā karissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:772: Acchariyaṃ vata bho, abbhutaṃ vata bho;
anya-e0903n0:775: Pucchā – tenāvuso jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena lakkhaṇasaṃyutte tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ piṇḍasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:776_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṃ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:776_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhaggavato sammukhe āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:776_2: etadavoca “idhāyasmā mahāmoggallāno gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto aññatarasmiṃ padese
anya-e0903n0:776_3: sitaṃ pātvākāsi, ko nukho āvuso moggallānahetu, ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti.
anya-e0903n0:776_4: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno “idhāhaṃ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ
anya-e0903n0:776_5: maṃsapiṇḍaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ, tamenaṃ gijjhāpi kākāpi kulalāpi anupatitvā anupatitvā
anya-e0903n0:776_6: vitacchenti virājenti. Sā sudaṃ aṭṭassaraṃ karotī”ti evamādinā ārocesi. Tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0903n0:776_7: vatthusmiṃ “cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti, ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:776_8: sāvakā viharanti, yatrahi nāma sāvako evarūpaṃ ñassati vā dakkhati vā sakkhiṃ vā
anya-e0903n0:778: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakehi mahātherehi saṃgītaṃ asilomasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:779_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṃ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:779_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavato sammukhe āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:779_2: etadavoca “ko nu kho āvuso moggallāna hetu, ko paccayo sitassa pātukammāyā”ti. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n0:779_3: ca bhante mahāmoggallānatthero “idhāhaṃ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ
anya-e0903n0:779_4: asilomaṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ”ti evamādinā ārocesi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ cakkhubhūtā
anya-e0903n0:779_5: vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti, ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti. (Peyyāla)
anya-e0903n0:779_6: eso bhikkhave satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe sūkariko ahosī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:781: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi saṃgītaṃ sūcilomasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:782: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante rājagahe āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṃ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavato sammukhe tatheva avoca.
anya-e0903n0:783_0: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno tatheva ārocesi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “cakkhubhūtā
anya-e0903n0:783_1: vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti, ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti, (peyyāla)
anya-e0903n0:783_2: eso bhikkhave satto imasmiṃyeva rājagahe sūto ahosī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitā.
anya-e0903n0:785: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi saṃgītāni pāpabhikkhusuttādīni pañcasuttāni bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n0:786_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe āyasmantañca lakkhaṇaṃ āyasmantañca mahāmoggallānaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0903n0:786_1: bhāsitāni. Āyasmā bhante lakkhaṇo bhagavato sammukhe pubbe vuttanayeneva ārocesi.
anya-e0903n0:786_2: Āyasmā ca bhante mahāmoggallāno “idhāhaṃ āvuso gijjhakūṭā pabbatā orohanto addasaṃ
anya-e0903n0:786_3: bhikkhuṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ. Addasaṃ bhikkhuniṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantiṃ. Addasaṃ sikkhamānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:786_4: vehāsaṃ gacchantiṃ. Addasaṃ sāmaṇeraṃ vehāsaṃ gacchantaṃ. Addasaṃ sāmaṇeriṃ vehāsaṃ
anya-e0903n0:786_5: gacchantiṃ. Tassā saṅghāṭipi ādittā sampajjalitā sajotibhūtā, pattopi āditto sampajjalito
anya-e0903n0:786_6: sajotibhūto, kāyabandhanampi ādittaṃ sampajjalitaṃ sajotibhūtaṃ, kāyopi āditto sampajjalito
anya-e0903n0:786_7: sajotibhūto, sā sudaṃ aṭṭassaraṃ karotī”ti evamādinā ārocesi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:786_8: “cakkhubhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti ñāṇabhūtā vata bhikkhave sāvakā viharanti.
anya-e0903n0:786_9: (Peyyāla). Eso bhikkhave bhikkhu kassapassasammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpabhikkhu
anya-e0903n0:786_10: ahosi. Esā bhikkhave bhikkhunī kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpabhikkhunī
anya-e0903n0:786_11: ahosi. Esā bhikkhave sikkhamānā kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasikkhamānā
anya-e0903n0:786_12: ahosi. Eso bhikkhave sāmaṇero kassapassasammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasāmaṇero ahosi.
anya-e0903n0:786_13: Esā bhikkhave sāmaṇerī kassapassa sammāsambuddhassa pāvacane pāpasāmaṇerī ahosī”ti
anya-e0903n0:789: Pucchā – opammasaṃyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi saṃgītaṃ nakhasikhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:790_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n0:790_1: katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ, yo cāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito, yā cāyaṃ
anya-e0903n0:791: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave, katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ.
anya-e0903n0:794: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi saṃgītaṃ āṇisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:795_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:795_1: dasārahānaṃ ānako nāma mudiṅgo ahosi, tassa dasārahā ānake ghaṭite aññaṃ āṇiṃ odahiṃsu,
anya-e0903n0:795_2: ahu kho so bhikkhave samayo yaṃ ānakassa mudiṅgassa porāṇaṃ pokkharaphalakaṃ antaradhāyi,
anya-e0903n0:798: Pucchā – bhikkhusaṃyutte āvuso bhagavatā navasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:799_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ navaṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññataro
anya-e0903n0:799_1: bhante navo bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto vihāraṃ pavisitvā apposukko
anya-e0903n0:799_2: tuṇhībhūto saṅkasāyabhi, na bhikkhūnaṃ veyyāvaccaṃ karoti cīvarakārasamaye tasmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:799_3: bhante vatthusmiṃ “mā kho tumhe bhikkhave etassa bhikkhuno ujjhāyitthā eso kho bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:799_4: bhikkhu catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhamma sukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī
anya-e0903n0:800: Ahampi kho bhante sakaṃ kiccaṃ karomi,
anya-e0903n0:801: Eso kho bhikkhave bhikkhu catunnaṃ jhānānaṃ ābhicetasikānaṃ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārānaṃ nikāmalābhī akicchalābhī akasiralābhī –
anya-e0903n0:805: Dhāreti antimaṃ dehaṃ, jetvā māraṃ savāhiniṃ–
anya-e0903n0:809: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena khandhavaggasaṃyutte paṭhamaṃ nakulapitusuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:810_0: Vissajjanā – bhaggesu bhante susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye nakulapitaraṃ gahapatiṃ
anya-e0903n0:810_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Nakulapitā bhante gahapati bhagavantaṃ “ahamasmi bhante jiṇṇo vuḍḍho
anya-e0903n0:810_2: mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto āturakāyo abhikkhaṇātaṅko, aniccadassāvī kho panāhaṃ
anya-e0903n0:810_3: bhante bhagavato manobhāvanīyānañca bhikkhūnaṃ, ovadatu maṃ bhante bhagavā, anusāsatu
anya-e0903n0:810_4: maṃ bhante bhagavā, yaṃ mamassa dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāyā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:810_5: “evametaṃ gahapati, evametaṃ gahapati, āturo hāyaṃ gahapati kāyo aṇḍabhūto pariyonaddho,
anya-e0903n0:810_6: yo hi gahapati imaṃ kāyaṃ pariharanto muhuttampi ārogyaṃ paṭijāneyya, kimaññatra
anya-e0903n0:810_7: bālyā. Tasmātiha te gahapati evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘āturakāyassa me sato cittaṃ anāturaṃ
anya-e0903n0:810_8: bhavissatī’ti. Evañhi te gahapati sikkhitabba”nti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:812: Pucchā – tañcāvuso bhagavatā saṃkhittena bhāsitaṃ vitthārena kena kathañca vibhattaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:813_0: Vissajjanā – taṃ kho bhante bhagavatā saṃkhittena desitaṃ “kathañca gahapati āturakāyo
anya-e0903n0:813_1: ceva hoti āturacitto ca. Idha gahapati assutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariyadhammassa
anya-e0903n0:813_2: akovido ariyadhamme avinīto, sappurisānaṃ adassāvī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme
anya-e0903n0:813_3: avinīto rūpaṃ attato samanupassati rūpavantaṃ vā attānaṃ, attani vā rūpaṃ, rūpasmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:813_4: vā attānaṃ, “ahaṃ rūpaṃ mama rūpa”nti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyī hoti. Tassa “ahaṃ rūpaṃ mama
anya-e0903n0:813_5: rūpa”nti pariyuṭṭhaṭṭhāyino taṃ rūpaṃ vipariṇamati aññathā hoti. Tassa rūpavipariṇāmaññathābhāvā
anya-e0903n0:813_6: uppajjanti sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsā”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā sāriputtena
anya-e0903n0:815: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiyavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhaka mahātherehi paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ aniccasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:816_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “rūpaṃ bhikkhaveaniccaṃ,
anya-e0903n0:816_1: vedanā aniccā, saññā aniccā, saṅkhārā aniccā, viññāṇaṃ aniccaṃ. Evaṃ passaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:816_2: sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati,
anya-e0903n0:816_3: saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati, nibbindaṃ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati,
anya-e0903n0:816_4: vimuttasmiṃ ‘vimutta’miti ñāṇaṃ hotī”ti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:818: Pucchā – dukkhaanattasuttāni panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n0:819_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “rūpaṃ bhikkhave dukkhaṃ,
anya-e0903n0:819_1: vedanā dukkhā, saññā dukkhā, saṅkhārā dukkhā, viññāṇaṃ dukkhaṃ. Rūpaṃ bhikkhave anattā,
anya-e0903n0:819_2: vedanā anattā, saññā anattā, saṅkhārā anattā, viññāṇaṃ anattā. Evaṃ passaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:819_3: sutavā ariyasāvako rūpasmimpi nibbindati, vedanāyapi nibbindati, saññāyapi nibbindati,
anya-e0903n0:819_4: saṅkhāresupi nibbindati, viññāṇasmimpi nibbindati, nibbindaṃ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati,
anya-e0903n0:819_5: vimuttasmiṃ ‘vimutta’miti ñāṇaṃ hoti, khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ,
anya-e0903n0:819_6: nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātī”ti evaṃ kho bhante bhagavatā bhāsitāni.
anya-e0903n0:821: Pucchā – bhārasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:822_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhārañca vo bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:822_1: desessāmi bhārahārañca bhārādānañca bhāranikkhepanañca, taṃ suṇātha. Katamo ca bhikkhavebhāro,
anya-e0903n0:822_2: ‘pañcupādānakkhandhā’ tissa vacanīyaṃ. Katame pañca, rūpupādānakkhandho vedanupādānakkhandho
anya-e0903n0:822_3: saññupādānakkhandho saṅkhārupādānakkhandho viññāṇupādānakkhandho. Ayaṃ vuccati bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:823: Bhārā have pañcakkhandhā, bhārahāro ca puggalo;
anya-e0903n0:825: Nikkhipitvā garuṃ bhāraṃ, aññaṃ bhāraṃ anādiya;
anya-e0903n0:828: Pucchā – na tumhākasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:829: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhu ārabbha “yaṃ bhikkhave natumhākaṃ taṃ pajahatha, taṃ vo pahīnaṃ hitāya sukhāyabhavissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:831: Pucchā – anattalakkhaṇasuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:832_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha “rūpaṃ
anya-e0903n0:832_1: bhikkhave anattā, rūpañca hidaṃ bhikkhave attā abhavissa, nayidaṃ rūpaṃ ābādhāya
anya-e0903n0:832_2: saṃvatteyya, labbhetha ca rūpe evaṃ me rūpaṃ hotu, evaṃ me rūpaṃ mā ahosī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:834: Pucchā – theravagge panāvuso tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ yamakasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:835_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ yamakattheraṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena
anya-e0903n0:835_1: dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmato bhante yamakattherassa evarūpaṃ pāpakaṃ diṭṭhigataṃ
anya-e0903n0:835_2: uppannaṃ hoti “tathāhaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāmi, yathā khīṇāsavo bhikkhu
anya-e0903n0:835_3: kāyassa bhedā ucchijjati vinassati, na hoti paraṃmaraṇā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:835_4: “taṃ kiṃ maññasi āvuso yamaka, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā
anya-e0903n0:836_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati āyasmato yamakattherassa
anya-e0903n0:837_0: Vissajjanā – taṃ kiṃ maññasi āvuso yamaka, rūpaṃ ‘tathāgato’ti samanupassasīti. ‘No
anya-e0903n0:837_1: hetaṃ āvuso’. Vedanaṃ. Saññaṃ. Saṅkhāre. Viññāṇaṃ ‘tathāgato’ti samanupassasīti.
anya-e0903n0:837_2: ‘No hetaṃ āvuso’ti evamādinā bhante āyasmā sāriputtatthero dhammasenāpati āyasmato
anya-e0903n0:837_3: yamakattherassa anuyogavattajhāpanavasena paṭipucchitvā paṭipucchitvā uttari dhammadesanaṃ pavattesi.
anya-e0903n0:838: Taṃ kiṃ maññasi āvuso yamaka, rūpaṃ, vedanaṃ, saññaṃ, saṅkhāre, viññāṇaṃ ‘tathāgato’ti samanupassasi–
anya-e0903n0:840: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena khandhavaggasaṃyutte theravagge pañcamaṃ vakkalisuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:841_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ vakkaliṃ theraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n0:841_1: bhante vakkalithero ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “cirapaṭikāhaṃ
anya-e0903n0:841_2: bhante bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo, natthi ca me kāyasmiṃ tāvatikā balamattā,
anya-e0903n0:841_3: yāvatāhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkameyya”nti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “alaṃ
anya-e0903n0:841_4: vakkali, kiṃ te iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena, yo kho vakkali dhammaṃ passati, so maṃ
anya-e0903n0:841_5: passati, yo maṃ passati, so dhammaṃ passati. Dhammañhi vakkali passanto maṃ passati,
anya-e0903n0:841_6: maṃ passanto dhammaṃ passati. Taṃ kiṃ maññasi vakkali, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti
anya-e0903n0:842: “Ahaṃ vakkali, kiṃ te iminā pūtikāyena diṭṭhena” –
anya-e0903n0:843: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi vakkali, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā” –
anya-e0903n0:845: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”–
anya-e0903n0:847: Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ “etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā”–
anya-e0903n0:848_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso punapi bhagavā bhikkhū pesetvā āyasmato vakkalittherassa paggahavacanaṃ
anya-e0903n0:848_1: ārocāpesi. Sopi kathaṃ attano pavattiṃ bhagavato paccārocāpesi. Kathañcassa abhisamparāyo ahosi.
anya-e0903n0:849_0: Vissajjanā – suṇāvuso tvaṃ vakkali bhagavato vacanaṃ dvinnañca devatānaṃ, imaṃ āvuso
anya-e0903n0:849_1: rattiṃ dve devatāyo abhikkantāya rattiyā abhikkantavaṇṇā kevalakappaṃ gijjhakūṭaṃ obhāsetvā yena
anya-e0903n0:850_0: Bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu, upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu,
anya-e0903n0:850_1: ekamantaṃ ṭhitā kho āvuso ekā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ‘vakkali bhante bhikkhu
anya-e0903n0:850_2: vimokkhāya cetetī’ti. Aparā devatā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca ‘so hi nūna bhante suvimutto
anya-e0903n0:850_3: vimuccissatī’ti. Bhagavā ca taṃ āvuso vakkali evamāha ‘mā bhāyi vakkali, mā bhāyi
anya-e0903n0:850_4: vakkali, apāpakaṃ te maraṇaṃ bhavissati, apāpikā kālakiriyā’ti. Evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā
anya-e0903n0:850_5: punapi bhikkhū pesetvā āyasmato vakkalittherassa paggahavacanaṃ ārocāpesi. Sopi bhante
anya-e0903n0:850_6: āyasmā tenahāvuso mama vacanena bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatha “vakkali bhante bhikkhu
anya-e0903n0:850_7: ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno, so bhagavato pāde sirasā vandatī”ti, evañca vadetha
anya-e0903n0:850_8: “rūpaṃ aniccaṃ, tāhaṃ bhante na kaṅkhāmi, yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhanti navicikicchāmi,
anya-e0903n0:850_9: yadaniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, natthi me tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃvāti
anya-e0903n0:850_10: na vicikicchāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavato attano pavattiṃ paccārocāpesi. So hi bhante
anya-e0903n0:850_11: āyasmā acirapakkantesu tesu bhikkhūsu satthaṃ āharitvā vedanaṃ vikkhambhetvā mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:850_12: ādāya sampajāno arahattaṃ sacchikatvā kālamakāsi. Evaṃ kho bhante tassa āyasmato
anya-e0903n0:852: Pucchā – assajisuttaṃ panāvuso bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:853_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante āyasmantaṃ assajiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante assaji
anya-e0903n0:853_1: ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “pubbe khvāhaṃ bhante gelaññe
anya-e0903n0:853_2: passambhetvā passambhetvā kāyasaṅkhāre viharāmi, sohaṃ samādhiṃ nappaṭilabhāmi. Tassa
anya-e0903n0:853_3: mayhaṃ bhante taṃ samādhiṃ appaṭilabhato evaṃ hoti no cassāhaṃ parihāyāmī”ti. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:853_4: bhante vatthusmiṃ “ye te assaji samaṇabrāhmaṇā samādhisārakā samādhisāmaññā, tesaṃ
anya-e0903n0:853_5: taṃ samādhiṃ appaṭilabhataṃ evaṃ hoti ‘no cassu mayaṃ parihāyāmā’ti. Taṃ kiṃ maññasi
anya-e0903n0:853_6: assaji, rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:855: Pucchā – khemakasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:856_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante sambahule there bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā khemakattherena
anya-e0903n0:856_1: bhāsitaṃ. Sambahulā bhante therā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dāsakaṃ pesetvā catukkhattuṃ
anya-e0903n0:856_2: āyasmantaṃ khemakaṃ ābādhikaṃ dukkhitaṃ bāḷhagilānaṃ gelaññakāraṇañca dhammañca pucchiṃsu,
anya-e0903n0:856_3: tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “pañcime āvuso upādānakkhandhā vuttā bhagavatā. Seyyathidaṃ,
anya-e0903n0:856_5: viññāṇupādānakkhandho, imesu khvāhaṃ āvuso pañcasu upādānakkhandhesu na kiñci attaṃ
anya-e0903n0:856_6: vā attaniyaṃ vā samanupassāmī”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā khemakattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:857_0: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha āyasmā khemako uttari dhammadesanaṃ pavaḍḍhetvā vitthārena
anya-e0903n0:857_1: therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ desesi. Kīdiso ca nesaṃ dhammadesakadhammappaṭiggāhakānaṃ dhammadesanāya ānisaṃso adhigato.
anya-e0903n0:858_0: Vissajjanā – catutthe bhante vāre āyasmā khemako “alaṃ āvuso dāsaka kiṃ imāya sandhāvanikāya,
anya-e0903n0:858_1: āharāvuso daṇḍaṃ, ahameva therānaṃ santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti daṇḍamolubbha āyasmā khemako
anya-e0903n0:858_2: yena therā bhikkhū tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā therehi bhikkhūhi pucchito “nakhvāhaṃ
anya-e0903n0:858_3: āvuso rūpaṃ asmīti vadāmi, napi aññatra rūpā asmīti vadāmi. Na khvāhaṃ āvuso vedanaṃ
anya-e0903n0:858_4: asmīti vadāmi, napi aññatra vedanā asmīti vadāmī”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmā khemako
anya-e0903n0:858_5: uttaripi dhammadesanaṃ pavaḍḍhetvā vitthārena desesi. Imasmiñca pana bhante veyyākaraṇasmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:858_6: bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṃ therānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṃsu
anya-e0903n0:858_7: āyasmatoca khemakassa. Evaṃ kho bhante tesaṃ therānaṃ dhammadesakadhammappaṭiggāhakānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:860: Pucchā – channasuttaṃ panāvuso kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:861_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ channattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n0:861_1: bhante channatthero āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “ovadatu maṃ āyasmā ānando, anusāsatu
anya-e0903n0:861_2: maṃ āyasmā ānando, karotu me āyasmā ānando dhammiṃ kathaṃ, yathāhaṃ dhammaṃ passeyya”nti.
anya-e0903n0:861_3: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “sammukhā me taṃ āvuso channa bhagavato sutaṃ, sammukhā
anya-e0903n0:861_4: paṭiggahitaṃ kaccānagottaṃ bhikkhuṃ ovadantassa, dvayanissito khvāyaṃ kaccāna loko
anya-e0903n0:861_5: yebhuyyena atthitañceva natthitañca, lokasamudayaṃ kho kaccāna yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya
anya-e0903n0:861_6: passato yā loke natthitā, sā na hotī”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā ānandattherena
anya-e0903n0:862: Ovadatu maṃ āyasmā ānando, anusāsatu maṃ āyasmā ānando.
anya-e0903n0:864: Pucchā – tenāvuso…pe… sammāsambuddhena khandhavaggasaṃyutte pupphavagge pupphasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:865_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “nāhaṃ bhikkhave lokena
anya-e0903n0:865_1: vivadāmi, lokova mayā vivadati, na bhikkhave dhammavādī kenaci lokasmiṃ vivadati,
anya-e0903n0:865_2: yaṃ bhikkhave natthi sammataṃ loke paṇḍitānaṃ, ahampitaṃ “natthī”ti vadāmi, yaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:865_3: atthisammataṃ loke paṇḍitānaṃ, ahampitaṃ “atthī”ti vadāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:867: Na bhikkhave dhammavādī kenaci lokasmiṃ vivadati.
anya-e0903n0:869: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pheṇapiṇḍūpamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:870_0: Vissajjanā – ayujjhāyaṃ bhante gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “seyyathāpi
anya-e0903n0:870_1: bhikkhave ayaṃ gaṅgā nadī mahantaṃ pheṇapiṇḍaṃ āvaheyya, tamenaṃ cakkhumā puriso
anya-e0903n0:870_2: passeyya nijjhāyeyya yoniso upaparikkheyya, tassa taṃ passato nijjhāyato yoniso upaparikkhato
anya-e0903n0:870_3: rittakaññeva khāyeyya, tucchakaññeva khāyeyya, asārakaññeva khāyeyya, kiṃ siyā bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:870_4: pheṇapiṇḍe sāro. Evameva kho bhikkhave yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ ajjhattaṃvā
anya-e0903n0:870_5: bahiddhā vā oḷārikaṃ vā sukhumaṃ vā hīnaṃ vā paṇītaṃ vā yaṃ dūre santike vā, taṃ
anya-e0903n0:870_6: bhikkhu passati nijjhāyati yoniso upaparikkhati, tassa taṃ passato nijjhāyato yoniso
anya-e0903n0:870_7: upaparikkhato rittakaññeva khāyati, tucchakaññeva khāyati, asārakaññeva khāyati,
anya-e0903n0:870_8: kiñhi siyā bhikkhave rūpe sāro”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:875: Rittakaṃ tucchakaṃ hoti, yo naṃ passati yoniso.
