anya-e0903n0:877: Pahānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ dhammānaṃ, rūpaṃ passatha chaḍḍitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:878: Āyu usmāca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:881: Vadhako esa akkhāto, sāro ettha na vijjati.
anya-e0903n0:883: Divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, sampajāno paṭissato.
anya-e0903n0:887: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dhammakathikavagge dutiyadhammakathikasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:888_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ bhikkhuṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññatamo bhante
anya-e0903n0:888_1: bhikkhu bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “dhammakathiko dhammakathikoti bhante vuccati, kittāvatā
anya-e0903n0:888_2: nu kho bhante dhammakathiko hoti, kittāvatā dhammānudhammappaṭipanno hoti, kittāvatā
anya-e0903n0:888_3: diṭṭhadhammanibbānappatto hotī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “rūpassa ce bhikkhu nibbidāya
anya-e0903n0:888_4: virāgāya nirodhāya dhammaṃ deseti, ‘dhammakathiko bhikkhū’ti alaṃ vacanāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:890: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi saṃgītaṃ sīlavantasuttañca sutavantasuttañca kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:891_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ mahākoṭṭhikaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena
anya-e0903n0:891_1: dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante mahākoṭṭhiko sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā
anya-e0903n0:891_2: vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā sāriputto tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0903n0:891_3: “sīlavatāvuso sāriputta bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasikātabbā. Sutāvatāvuso
anya-e0903n0:891_4: sāriputta bhikkhunā katame dhammā yoniso manasikātabbā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:891_5: “sīlavatāvuso koṭṭhika bhikkhunā, sutāvatāvuso koṭṭhika bhikkhunā pañcupādānakkhandhā
anya-e0903n0:891_6: aniccato dukkhato rogato gaṇḍato sallato aghato ābādhato parato palokato suññato
anya-e0903n0:891_7: anattato yoniso manasikātabbā”ti evamādinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:894: Pucchā – rādhasaṃyutte panāvuso dutiyaṃ sattasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:895_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ rādhattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n0:895_1: bhante rādhatthero bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “satto sattoti bhante vuccati, kittāvatā
anya-e0903n0:895_2: nu kho bhante sattoti vuccatī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “rūpe kho rādha yo chando
anya-e0903n0:895_3: yo rāgo yā nandī yā taṇhā, tatra satto tatra visatto, tasmā sattoti vuccatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:898: Pucchā – diṭṭhisaṃyutte panāvuso tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ soattā suttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:899_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “kismiṃ nu kho bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:899_1: sati kiṃ upādāya kiṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati so attā so loko so pecca bhavissāmi
anya-e0903n0:899_2: nicco dhuvo sassato avipariṇāmadhammo”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:901: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso pañcamaṃ natthidinnasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:902_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “kismiṃ nu kho bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:902_1: sati kiṃ upādāya kiṃ abhinivissa evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati natthi dinnaṃ, natthi yiṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0903n0:902_2: natthi hutaṃ, natthi sukatadukkaṭānaṃ kammānaṃ phalaṃ vipāko”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:905: Pucchā – okkantasaṃyutte panāvuso paṭhamaṃ cakkhusuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:906_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “cakkhuṃ bhikkhave aniccaṃ
anya-e0903n0:906_1: vipariṇāmi aññathābhāvi. Sotaṃ. Ghānaṃ. Jivhaṃ. Kāyo. Mano anicco vipariṇāmī aññathābhāvī”ti
anya-e0903n0:909: Pucchā – sāriputtasaṃyutte panāvuso dasamaṃ sucimukhīsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:910_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sucimukhiṃ paribbājikaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena
anya-e0903n0:910_1: dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ. Sucimukhī bhante paribbājikā āyasmantaṃ sāriputtaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0903n0:910_2: “kiṃ nu kho samaṇa adhomukho bhuñjasī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “na khvāhaṃ bhagini
anya-e0903n0:910_3: adhomukho bhuñjāmī”ti evamādinā paṭikkhipitvā “ye hi keci bhagini samaṇabrāhmaṇā
anya-e0903n0:910_4: vatthuvijjā tiracchānavijjāya micchājīvena jīvikaṃ kappenti, ime vuccanti bhagini
anya-e0903n0:910_5: samaṇabrāhmaṇā adhomukhā bhuñjantī”ti evamādinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:911: Kiṃ nu kho samaṇa adho mukho bhuñjasi.
anya-e0903n0:917: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena saḷāyatanavaggasaṃyutte paṭhamaṃ ajjhattāniccasuttañca catutthaṃ bāhirāniccasuttañca kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:918_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “cakkhuṃ bhikkhave aniccaṃ,
anya-e0903n0:918_1: yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā, yadanattā taṃ ‘netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi,
anya-e0903n0:918_2: na meso attā’ti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya daṭṭhabba”nti evamādināca. “Rūpā
anya-e0903n0:918_3: bhikkhave aniccā. Yadaniccaṃ taṃ dukkhaṃ, yaṃ dukkhaṃ tadanattā, yadanattā taṃ netaṃ
anya-e0903n0:918_4: mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā”ti ca evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:921: Pucchā – tatthāvuso sabbavagge chaṭṭhaṃ ādittasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:922_0: Vissajjanā – gayāyaṃ bhante gayāsīse purāṇajaṭilaṃ bhikkhusahassaṃ ārabbha “sabbaṃ
anya-e0903n0:922_1: bhikkhave ādittaṃ, kiñca bhikkhave sabbaṃ ādittaṃ. Cakkhu bhikkhave ādittaṃ, rūpā
anya-e0903n0:922_2: ādittā, cakkhuviññāṇaṃ ādittaṃ, cakkhusamphasso āditto, yampidaṃ cakkhusamphassapaccayā
anya-e0903n0:922_3: uppajjati, vedayitaṃ sukhaṃ vā dukkhaṃ vā adukkhamasukhaṃvā, tampi ādittaṃ. Kena
anya-e0903n0:922_4: ādittaṃ. Rāgagginā dosagginā mohagginā ādittaṃ, jātiyā jarāya maraṇena sokehi paridevehi
anya-e0903n0:922_5: dukkhehi domanassehi upāyāsehi ādittanti vadāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:925: Pucchā – migajālavagge āvuso paṭhamamigajālasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:926_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ migajālattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n0:926_1: bhante migajālatthero bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ekavihārī ekavihārīti bhante vuccati,
anya-e0903n0:926_2: kittāvatānukho bhante ekavihārī hoti, kittāvatāca pana sadutiyavihārī hotī”ti. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:926_3: bhante vatthusmiṃ “santi kho migajāla cakkhuviññeyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā manāpā piyarūpā
anya-e0903n0:926_4: kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati,
anya-e0903n0:926_5: tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī, nandiyā sati
anya-e0903n0:926_6: sārāgo hoti, sārāge sati saṃyogo hoti, nandisaṃyojanasaṃyutto kho migajāla bhikkhu
anya-e0903n0:928: Pucchā – tattheva navamaṃ saṃgītaṃ paṭhamachaphassāyatanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:929_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “yo hi koci vikkhave bhikkhu
anya-e0903n0:929_1: channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca
anya-e0903n0:929_2: yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti, avusitaṃ tena brahmacariyaṃ, ārakā so imasmā dhammavinayā”ti
anya-e0903n0:930: Ahaṃ hi bhante channaṃ phassāyatanānaṃ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāmi.
anya-e0903n0:931: Cakkhuṃ etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attāti samanupassasi.
anya-e0903n0:933: Ettha ca te bhikkhu cakkhu netaṃ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attāti evametaṃ yathābhūtaṃ sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhaṃ bhavissati, esevanto dukkhassa.
anya-e0903n0:936: Pucchā – gilānavagge panāvuso paṭhamaṃ gilānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:937_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante aññataraṃ navaṃ bhikkhuṃ gilānaṃ ābādhitaṃ dukkhitaṃ
anya-e0903n0:937_1: bāḷhagilānaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññataro bhante bhikkhu gilāno ābādhiko dukkhito bāḷhagilāno
anya-e0903n0:937_2: bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “nakhvāhaṃ bhante sīlavisuddhatthaṃ bhagavatā dhammaṃ desitaṃ
anya-e0903n0:937_3: ājānāmī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ taṃ bhikkhuṃ paṭipucchitvā tassa ca vacanaṃ
anya-e0903n0:937_4: sādhukāraṃ datvā “rāgavirāgattho hi bhikkhu mayā dhammo desito, taṃ kiṃ maññasi bhikkhu,
anya-e0903n0:937_5: cakkhu niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti. Aniccaṃ bhante. Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ
anya-e0903n0:937_6: vāti, dukkhaṃ bhante”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:939: Sādhu kho tvaṃ bhikkhu rāgavirāgatthaṃ mayā dhammaṃ desitaṃ ājānāsi,
anya-e0903n0:942: Pucchā – channavagge panāvuso pañcamaṃ saṃgītaṃ puṇṇasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:943_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ puṇṇattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ, āyasmā
anya-e0903n0:943_1: bhante puṇṇatthero bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ
anya-e0903n0:943_2: desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto
anya-e0903n0:943_3: vihareyya”nti. Tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “santi kho puṇṇa cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā iṭṭhā kantā
anya-e0903n0:943_4: manāpā piyarūpā kāmūpasaṃhitā rajanīyā, tañce bhikkhu abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya
anya-e0903n0:943_5: tiṭṭhati, tassa taṃ abhinandato abhivadato ajjhosāya tiṭṭhato uppajjati nandī, nandī
anya-e0903n0:943_6: samudayo dukkhasamudayo puṇṇāti vadāmī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:944_0: Pucchā – evañcāvuso bhagavā āyasmato puṇṇattherassa saṃkhittena ovādaṃ datvā kathañca
anya-e0903n0:944_1: naṃ paṭipucchi, kathañca so bhagavato ārocesi, kathañcassāyasmato puṇṇattherassa
anya-e0903n0:945_0: Vissajjanā – evaṃ kho bhante bhagavā āyasmato puṇṇattherassa saṃkhittena ovādaṃ datvā
anya-e0903n0:945_1: “iminā tvaṃ puṇṇa mayā saṃkhittena ovādena ovadito katamasmiṃ janapade viharissasī”ti
anya-e0903n0:945_2: taṃ āyasmantaṃ puṇṇattheraṃ paṭipucchi. So ca bhante āyasmā “atthi bhante sunāparanto
anya-e0903n0:945_3: nāma janapado, tatthāhaṃ viharissāmī”ti evamādinā bhagavato ārocesi. So hi bhante
anya-e0903n0:945_4: āyasmā sunāparante janapade vasitvā teneva antaravassena tisso vijjā sacchākāsi.
anya-e0903n0:945_5: Teneva antaravassena parinibbāyi. Evaṃ kho bhante tassa āyasmato abhisamparāyo ahosi.
anya-e0903n0:946: Santi kho tassa bhagavato sāvakā kāyena ca jīvitena ca aṭṭīyamānā harāyamānā jigucchamānā satthahārakaṃ pariyesanti.
anya-e0903n0:947: Sakkhissasi kho tvaṃ puṇṇa iminā damūpasamena samannāgato sunāparasantasmiṃ janapade vatthuṃ.
anya-e0903n0:950: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena saḷavagge dutiyaṃ mālukyaputtasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:951_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ mālukyaputtattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:951_1: Āyasmā bhante mālukyaputtatthero bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṃkhittena
anya-e0903n0:951_2: dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto
anya-e0903n0:951_3: vihareyya”nti. Tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “ettha dāni mālukyaputta kiṃ dahare bhikkhū vakkhāmāti”ādinā
anya-e0903n0:951_4: theraṃ apasādetvā ceva ussādetvā ca “taṃ kiṃ maññasi mālukyaputta, ye te cakkhuviññeyyā
anya-e0903n0:951_5: rūpā adiṭṭhā adiṭṭhapubbā, na ca passasi, na ca te hoti passeyyanti, atthi te tattha
anya-e0903n0:951_6: chando vā rāgo vā evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:952_0: Pucchā – imasmiṃ ca kho panāvuso bhagavatā ovāde saṃkhittena bhāsite so āyasmā mālukyaputtatthero
anya-e0903n0:952_1: bhagavantaṃ kiṃ avoca kathañcassa bhagavā anuññāsi. Kīdiso cassāyasmato mālukyaputtattherassa
anya-e0903n0:953_0: Vissajjanā – imasmiṃ kho bhante ovāde bhagavatā saṃkhittena bhāsite āyasmā mālukyaputtatthero
anya-e0903n0:953_1: bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “imassa khvāhaṃ bhante bhagavatā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi.
anya-e0903n0:954: Rūpaṃ disvā muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto;
anya-e0903n0:958: Evaṃ ācinato dukkhaṃ, ārā nibbāna vuccati;
anya-e0903n0:960: Na so rajjati dhammesu, dhammaṃ ñatvā paṭissato;
anya-e0903n0:962: Yathāssa jānato dhammaṃ, sevato cāpi vedanaṃ;
anya-e0903n0:963: Khīyati nopacīyati, evaṃ so caratī sato;
anya-e0903n0:964: Evaṃ apacinato dukkhaṃ, santike nibbāna vuccatīti.
anya-e0903n0:965_0: Imassa khvāhaṃ bhante bhagavatā saṃkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmīti.
anya-e0903n0:965_1: Bhagavā ca bhante “sādhu sādhu mālukyaputta, sādhu kho tvaṃ mālukyaputta mayā saṃkhittena
anya-e0903n0:965_2: bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsī”ti sādhukāraṃ datvā–
anya-e0903n0:966: “Rūpaṃ disvā sati muṭṭho, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto;
anya-e0903n0:969_0: Therassa vacanaṃ samanuññāsi. So ca bhante āyasmā mālukyaputtatthero eko vūpakaṭṭho
anya-e0903n0:969_1: appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā
anya-e0903n0:969_2: anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ
anya-e0903n0:969_3: abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi, “khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ
anya-e0903n0:969_4: karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi. Aññataroca panāyasmā mālukyaputto arahataṃ
anya-e0903n0:969_5: ahosi. Evaṃ kho bhante tassa āyasmato abhisamparāyo ahosi.
anya-e0903n0:970: Rūpaṃ disvā sati muṭṭhā, piyaṃ nimittaṃ manasi karoto;
anya-e0903n0:973: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso catutthaṃ pamādavihārīsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:974_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “pamādavihāriñca vo bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:974_1: desessāmi appamādavihāriñca, taṃ suṇātha. Kathañca bhikkhave pamādavihārī hoti. Cakkhundriyaṃ
anya-e0903n0:974_2: asaṃvutassa bhikkhave viharato cittaṃ byāsiñcati cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu, tassa byāsittacittassa
anya-e0903n0:974_3: pāmojjaṃ na hoti, pāmojje asati pīti na hoti, pītiyā passaddhi na hoti, passaddhiyā
anya-e0903n0:974_4: asati dukkhaṃ hoti, dukkhino cittaṃ na samādhiyati, asamāhi te citte dhammā na pātubhavanti,
anya-e0903n0:974_5: dhammānaṃ apātubhāvā pamādavihārītveva saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:977: Pucchā – lokakāmaguṇavagge āvuso aṭṭhamaṃ rāhulovādasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:978_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃyeva bhante āyasmantaṃ rāhulaṃ ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññasi rāhula,
anya-e0903n0:978_1: cakkhu niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vāti. Aniccaṃ bhante. Yaṃ panāniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃvāti.
anya-e0903n0:978_2: Dukkhaṃ bhante. Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ
anya-e0903n0:978_3: ‘etaṃ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti. No hetaṃ bhante”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:979: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ rāhulaṃ uttariṃ āsavānaṃ khaye vineyyaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:983: Pucchā – gahapativagge āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi catutthaṃ saṃgītaṃ bhāradvājasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:984_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante rājānaṃ udenaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā piṇḍolabhāradvājattherena
anya-e0903n0:984_1: bhāsitaṃ. Rājā bhante udeno āyasmantaṃ piṇḍolabhāradvājaṃ etadavoca “ko nu kho bho
anya-e0903n0:984_2: bhāradvāja hetu ko paccayo, yenime daharā bhikkhū susū kāḷakesā bhadrena yobbanena
anya-e0903n0:984_3: samannāgatā paṭhamena vayasā anikīḷitāvino kāmesu yāvajīvaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ
anya-e0903n0:984_4: brahmacariyaṃ caranti, addhānañca āpādentī”ti. Tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “vuttaṃ kho
anya-e0903n0:985_0: Etaṃ mahārāja tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena etha tumhe bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:985_1: mātumattīsu mātucittaṃ upaṭṭhapetha. Bhaganimattīsu bhaginicittaṃ upaṭṭhapetha, dhītumattīsu
anya-e0903n0:985_2: dhītucittaṃ upaṭṭhapethā”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā piṇḍola bhāradvājattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:987: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ verahaccānisuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:988_0: Vissajjanā – kāmaṇḍāyaṃ bhante verahaccānigottaṃ brāhmaṇiṃ ārabbha āyasmatā udāyittherena
anya-e0903n0:988_1: bhāsitaṃ. Verahaccānīgottā bhante brāhmaṇī āyasmantaṃ udāyittheraṃ etadavoca “kismiṃ
anya-e0903n0:988_2: nu kho bhante sati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ paññapenti, kismiṃ asati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ
anya-e0903n0:988_3: na paññapentī”ti. Tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “cakkhusmiṃ kho bhagini sati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ
anya-e0903n0:988_4: paññapenti, cakkhusmiṃ asati arahanto sukhadukkhaṃ na paññapentī”ti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0903n0:991: Pucchā – devadahavagge āvuso khaṇasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:992_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante devadahe nāma sakyānaṃ nigame sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha
anya-e0903n0:992_1: “lābhā vo bhikkhave, suladdhaṃ vo bhikkhave, khaṇo vo paṭiladdho brahmacariyavāsāyā”ti
anya-e0903n0:995: Pucchā – samuddavagge panāvuso tatiyaṃ bāḷisikopamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:996_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante jīvakambavane sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “seyyathāpi
anya-e0903n0:996_1: bhikkhave bāḷisiko āmisagatabaḷisaṃ gambhīre udakarahade pakkhipeyyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:998: Pucchā – saḷāyatanavaggasaṃyutte samuddavagge panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi saṃgītaṃ aṭṭhamaṃ ādittapariyāyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:999_0: Vissajjanā – sambahule bhante bhikkhū ārabbha “ādittapariyāyaṃ vo bhikkhave dhammapariyāyaṃ
anya-e0903n0:999_1: desessāmi, taṃ suṇātha. Katamo ca bhikkhave ādittapariyāyo dhammapariyāyo. Varaṃ
anya-e0903n0:999_2: bhikkhave tattāya ayosalākāya ādittāya sampajjalitāya sajotibhūtāya cakkhundriyaṃ
anya-e0903n0:999_3: sampalimaṭṭhaṃ, natveva cakkhuviññeyyesu rūpesu anubyañjanaso nimittaggāho”tiādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1002: Pucchā – āsīvisavagge āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi catutthaṃ saṃgītaṃ paṭhamadārukkhandhopamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1003_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante gaṅgāya nadiyā tīre sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “passatha
anya-e0903n0:1003_1: no tumhe bhikkhave amhaṃ mahantaṃ dārukkhandhaṃ gaṅgāya nadiyā sotena vuyhamāna”nti
anya-e0903n0:1005: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā orimatīrādīnaṃ upacāravacanānaṃ attho vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsito.
anya-e0903n0:1006_0: Vissajjanā – orimaṃ tīranti kho bhikkhu channetaṃ ajjhattikānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1006_1: Pārimaṃ tīranti kho bhikkhu channetaṃ bāhirānaṃ āyatanānaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Majjhe saṃsīdoti
anya-e0903n0:1006_2: kho bhikkhu nandirāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Thale ussādoti kho bhikkhu asmimānassetaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1006_3: adhivacananti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha orimatīrādīnaṃ upacāravacanānaṃ attho
anya-e0903n0:1007: Pucchā – imasmiṃ kho pana āvuso sutte bhagavatā bhāsite visesato kassa kīdiso attho kathañca paṭiladdho.
anya-e0903n0:1008: Vissajjanā – imasmiṃ bhante sutte bhagavatā bhāsite visesato nandassa gopālakassa pabbajjā ca upasampadā ca yāva arahattāca visesato attho adhigato.
anya-e0903n0:1009: Labheyyāhaṃ bhante bhagavato santike pabbajjaṃ, labheyyaṃ upasampadaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1010: Tena hi tvaṃ nanda sāmikānaṃ gāvo niyyātehi.
anya-e0903n0:1013: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi aṭṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ kiṃsukopamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1014_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme aññataraṃ kārakaṃ bhikkhuṃ
anya-e0903n0:1014_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Aññataro bhante kārako bhikkhu cattāro khāṇāsave bhikkhū ñāṇadassanavisuddhaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1014_2: pucchitvā asantuṭṭho tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ pañhāveyyākaraṇena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami.
anya-e0903n0:1014_3: Upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kittāvatā nu kho bhante bhikkhuno dassanaṃ suvisuddhaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1014_4: hotī”ti. Tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ “seyyathāpi bhikkhu purisassa kiṃsuko adiṭṭhapubbo assa,
anya-e0903n0:1014_5: so yenaññataro puriso kiṃsukassa dassāvī tenupasaṅkameyyā”ti evamādinā bhante bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1016: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ chappāṇakopamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1017: Vissajjanā – sakkesuyeva bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave puriso arugatto pakkagatto saravanaṃ paviseyyā’ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1018: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā asaṃvaro vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0903n0:1019_0: Vissajjanā – kathañca bhikkhave asaṃvaro hoti, idha bhikkhave bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1019_1: disvā piyarūpe rūpe adhimuccati, appiyarūpe rūpe byāpajjati, anupaṭṭhitakāyassati
anya-e0903n0:1019_2: ca viharati parittacetaso. Tañca cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ yathābhūtaṃ nappajānāti,
anya-e0903n0:1019_3: yatthassa te uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā aparisesā nirujjhantīti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0903n0:1019_4: bhagavatā tattha asaṃvaro vitthārena vibhajitvā desito.
anya-e0903n0:1020: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā saṃvaro vibhajitvā vitthārena desito.
anya-e0903n0:1021_0: Vissajjanā – kathañca bhikkhave saṃvaro hoti, idha bhikkhave bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1021_1: disvā piyarūpe rūpe nādhimuccati, appiyarūpe rūpe na byāpajjatīti, evamādinā bhante
anya-e0903n0:1021_2: bhagavatā tattha saṃvaro vibhajitvā vitthārena desito.
anya-e0903n0:1024: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena vedanāsaṃyutte pañcamaṃ daṭṭhabbasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1025_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha
anya-e0903n0:1025_1: “tisso imā bhikkhave vedanā. Katamā tisso, sukhā vedanā dukkhāvedanā adukkhamasukhā
anya-e0903n0:1025_2: vedanā. Sukhā bhikkhave vedanā dukkhato daṭṭhabbā, dukkhā vedanā sallato daṭṭhabbā,
anya-e0903n0:1025_3: adukkhamasukhā vedanā aniccato daṭṭhabbā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1027: Yo sukhaṃ dukkhato addasa, dukkhamaddakkhi sallato;
anya-e0903n0:1029: Sa ve sammaddaso bhikkhu, parijānāti vedanā;
anya-e0903n0:1030: So vedanā pariññāya, diṭṭhe dhamme anāsavo;
anya-e0903n0:1031: Kāyassa bhedā dhammaṭṭho, saṅkhyaṃ nopeti vedagū.
anya-e0903n0:1033: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso chaṭṭhaṃ sallasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1034_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha
anya-e0903n0:1034_1: “assutavā bhikkhave puthujjano sukhampi vedanaṃ vedayati, dukkhampi vedanaṃ vedayati,
anya-e0903n0:1034_2: adukkhamasukhampi vedanaṃ vedayati. Sutavā bhikkhave ariyasāvako sukhampi vedanaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1034_3: vedayati, dukkhampi vedanaṃ vedayati, adukkhamasukhampi vedanaṃ vedayati. Tatra bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:1034_4: ko viseso, ko adhippayāso, kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ sutavato ariyabhāvakassa assutavatā puthujjanenā”ti
anya-e0903n0:1037: Pucchā – jambukhādakasaṃyutte āvuso paṭhamaṃ nibbānapañhāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1038_0: Vissajjanā – magadhesu bhante nālakagāmake jambukhādakaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā
anya-e0903n0:1038_1: sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ. Jambukhādako bhante paribbājako āyasmantaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1038_2: sāriputtaṃ etadavoca “nibbānaṃ nibbānanti āvuso sāriputta vuccati, katamaṃ nukho
anya-e0903n0:1038_3: āvuso nibbāna”nti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yo kho āvuso rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo,
anya-e0903n0:1038_4: idaṃ vuccati nibbāna”nti evamādinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1040: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ dhammavādīpañhāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1041_0: Vissajjanā – magadhesuyeva bhante nālakagāme jambukhādakaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā
anya-e0903n0:1041_1: sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ. Jambukhādako bhante paribbājako āyasmantaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1041_2: sāriputtaṃ etadavoca “ke nu kho āvuso sāriputta loke dhammavādino, ke loke suppaṭipannā,
anya-e0903n0:1041_3: ke loke sugatā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “ye kho āvuso rāgappahānāya dhammaṃ desenti,
anya-e0903n0:1041_4: dosappahānāya dhammaṃ desenti, mohappahānāya dhammaṃ desenti. Te loke dhammavādino”ti
anya-e0903n0:1045: Pucchā – tattheva porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhaka mahātherehi pariyosānasuttabhāvena saṃgītaṃ dukkarapañhāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1046_0: Vissajjanā – magadhesuyeva nālakagāme jambukhādakaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā
anya-e0903n0:1046_1: sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ. Jambukhādako bhante paribbājako āyasmantaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1046_2: sāriputtaṃ etadavoca “kiṃ nu kho āvuso sāriputta imasmiṃ dhammavinaye dukkara”nti.
anya-e0903n0:1046_3: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “pabbajjā kho āvuso imasmiṃ dhammavinaye dukkarā”ti evamādinā
anya-e0903n0:1049: Pucchā – moggallānasaṃyutte āvuso dasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ sakkasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1050_0: Vissajjanā – devesu bhante tāvatiṃsesu sakkaṃ devānamindaṃ ārabbha “sādhu kho devānaminda
anya-e0903n0:1050_1: buddhasaraṇagamanaṃ hoti, buddhasaraṇagamanahetu kho devānaminda evamidhekacce sattā
anya-e0903n0:1050_2: kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjantī”ti evamādinā bhante āyasmatā
anya-e0903n0:1053: Pucchā – cittasaṃyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi aṭṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ nigaṇṭhanāṭaputtasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1054_0: Vissajjanā – macchikāsaṇḍe bhante nigaṇṭhaṃ nāṭaputtaṃ ārabbha cittena gahapatinā
anya-e0903n0:1054_1: bhāsitaṃ. Nigaṇṭho bhante nāṭaputto cittaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca “saddahasi tvaṃ gahapati
anya-e0903n0:1054_2: samaṇassa gotamassa atthi avitakko avicāro samādhi, atthi vitakkavicārānaṃ nirodho”ti.
anya-e0903n0:1054_3: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “na khvāhaṃ ettha bhante bhagavato saddhāya gacchāmi, atthi
anya-e0903n0:1054_4: avitakko avicāro samādhi, atthi vitakkavicārānaṃ nirodho”ti evamādinā cittena gahapatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1057: “Ahaṃ kho bhante yāvadeva ākaṅkhāmi, vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmi” –
anya-e0903n0:1060: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi navamaṃ saṃgītaṃ acelakassapasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1061_0: Vissajjanā – tattheva bhante macchikāsaṇḍe acelaṃ kassapaṃ ārabbha cittena gahapatinā
anya-e0903n0:1061_1: bhāsitaṃ. Acelo bhante kassapo cittaṃ gahapatiṃ etadavoca “imehi pana te gahapati
anya-e0903n0:1061_2: tiṃsamattehi vassehi atthi koci uttarimanussadhammo alamariyañāṇadassanaviseso adhigato
anya-e0903n0:1061_3: phāsuvihāro”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “gihinopi siyā bhante ahañhi bhante yāvadeva
anya-e0903n0:1061_4: ākaṅkhāmi, vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1061_5: pītisukhaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ upasampajja viharāmī”ti evamādinā cittena gahapatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1064: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena gāmaṇisaṃyutte paṭhamaṃ caṇḍasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1065_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante caṇḍaṃ gāmaṇiṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Caṇḍo bhante gāmaṇi
anya-e0903n0:1065_1: bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ko nu kho bhante hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacco caṇḍo caṇḍotveva
anya-e0903n0:1065_2: saṅkhaṃ gacchati. Ko pana bhante hetu ko paccayo, yena midhekacco sorato soratotveva
anya-e0903n0:1065_3: saṅkhaṃ gacchatī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “idha gāmaṇi ekaccassa rāgo appahīno
anya-e0903n0:1065_4: hoti, rāgassa appahīnattā pare kopenti, parehi kopiyamāno kopaṃ pātukaroti, so caṇḍotveva
anya-e0903n0:1067: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi sattamaṃ saṃgītaṃ khettūpamasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1068_0: Vissajjanā – nāḷandāyaṃ bhante pāvārikambavane asibandhakaputtaṃ gāmaṇiṃ ārabbha
anya-e0903n0:1068_1: bhāsitaṃ. Asibandhakaputto bhante gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “nanu bhante bhagavā
anya-e0903n0:1068_2: sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharatīti. Evaṃ gāmaṇi tathāgato sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī
anya-e0903n0:1068_3: viharatīti. Atha kiñcarahi bhante bhagavā ekaccānaṃ sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ deseti, ekaccānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1068_4: no tathā sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ desetī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tena hi gāmaṇi taññevettha
anya-e0903n0:1068_5: paṭipucchissāmi, yathā te khameyya, tathā naṃ byākareyyāsī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1070: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhaka mahātherehi aṭṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ saṅkhadhamasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1071_0: Vissajjanā – nāḷandāyaṃyeva bhante pāvārikambavane asibandhakaputtaṃ gāmaṇiṃ nigaṇṭhasāvakaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1071_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Bhagavā bhante asibandhakaputtaṃ gāmaṇiṃ nigaṇṭhasāvakaṃ etadavoca
anya-e0903n0:1071_2: “kathaṃ nu kho gāmaṇi nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ desetī”ti. Evaṃ kho bhante
anya-e0903n0:1071_3: nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto sāvakānaṃ dhammaṃ deseti “yo koci pāṇaṃ atipāteti, sabbo so āpāyiko
anya-e0903n0:1071_4: nerayiko. (Peyyāla) yaṃbahulaṃ yaṃbahulaṃ viharati, tena tena nīyatī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0903n0:1071_5: vatthusmiṃ “yaṃbahulaṃ yaṃbahulañca gāmaṇi viharati, tena tena nīyati, evaṃ sante
anya-e0903n0:1071_6: na koci āpāyiko nerayiko bhavissati, yathā nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa vacana”nti evaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1073: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā yaṃbahulavāde doso pakāsito.
anya-e0903n0:1074_0: Vissajjanā – taṃ kiṃ maññasi gāmaṇi, yo so puriso pāṇātipātī rattiyā vā divasassa
anya-e0903n0:1074_1: vā samayāsamayaṃ upādāya katamo bahutaro samayo yaṃ vāso pāṇamatipāteti. Yaṃ vā so
anya-e0903n0:1074_2: pāṇaṃ nātipātetīti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā asibandhakaṃ nigaṇṭhanāṭaputtassa
anya-e0903n0:1074_3: sāvakaṃ gāmaṇiṃ pucchitvā pucchitvā yaṃbahulavāde doso pakāsito.
anya-e0903n0:1075: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā anekaṃsa vipākakammassa ekaṃ savipākavāde doso pakāsito.
anya-e0903n0:1076_0: Vissajjanā – idha gāmaṇi ekacco satthā evaṃvādī hoti evaṃdiṭṭhi yo koci pāṇamatipāteti,
anya-e0903n0:1076_1: sabbo so āpāyiko nerayikoti evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā anekaṃsa kammavipākassa
anya-e0903n0:1077: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā yathādhammasāsane guṇovibhajitvā pakāsito.
anya-e0903n0:1078_0: Vissajjanā – idha pana gāmaṇi tathāgato loke uppajjati arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno
anya-e0903n0:1078_1: sugato lokavidū anuttaropurisa dammasārathi satthādevamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā,
anya-e0903n0:1078_2: so anekapariyāyena pāṇātipātaṃ garahati vigarahati. “Pāṇātipātā viramathā”ti cāhāti
anya-e0903n0:1078_3: evamādinā bhante bhagavatā tattha yathādhammasāsane guṇo vitthāretvā pakāsito.
anya-e0903n0:1080: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi ekādasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ bhadrakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1081_0: Vissajjanā – mallesu bhante uruvelakappenāma mallānaṃ nigame bhadrakaṃ gāmaṇiṃ ārabbha
anya-e0903n0:1081_1: bhāsitaṃ. Bhadrako bhante gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sādhu me bhante bhagavā dukkhassa
anya-e0903n0:1081_2: samudayañca atthaṅgamañca desetū”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “ahañce te gāmaṇi atītamaddhānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1081_3: ārabbha dukkhassa samudayañca atthaṅgamañca deseyyaṃ ‘evaṃ ahosi atītamaddhāna’nti.
anya-e0903n0:1081_4: Tatra te siyā kaṅkhā siyā vimatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1084: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi gāmaṇi, atthi uruvelakappe manussā” –
anya-e0903n0:1086: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena gāmaṇisaṃyutte dvādasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ rāsiyasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1087_0: Vissajjanā – mallesu bhante uruvelakappenāma mallānaṃ nigame rāsiyaṃ gāmaṇiṃ ārabbha
anya-e0903n0:1087_1: bhāsitaṃ. Rāsiyo bhante gāmaṇi bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā etadadoca “sutaṃ me bhante
anya-e0903n0:1087_2: ‘samaṇo gotamo sabbaṃ tapaṃ garahati, sabbaṃ tamassiṃ lūkhajīviṃ ekaṃsena upavadati
anya-e0903n0:1087_3: upakkosatī”ti. Ye te bhante evamāhaṃsu ‘samaṇo gotamo sabbaṃ tapaṃ garahati, sabbaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1087_4: tapassiṃ lūkhajīviṃ ekaṃsena upavadati upakkosatī”ti. Kacci te bhante bhagavato vuttavādino,
anya-e0903n0:1087_5: na ca bhagavantaṃ abhūtena abbhācikkhanti, dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākarontī”ti. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:1087_6: bhante vatthusmiṃ ye te gāmaṇi evamāhaṃsu “samaṇo gotamo sabbaṃ tapaṃ garahati, sabbaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1087_7: tapassiṃ lūkhajīviṃ ekaṃsena upavadati upakkosatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1088: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā garahitabbāgarahitabbā kāmabhogino vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n0:1089_0: Vissajjanā – tayo kho me gāmaṇi kāmabhogino santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame tayo.
anya-e0903n0:1089_1: Idha gāmaṇi ekacco kāmabhogī adhammena bhoge pariyesati sāhasena, adhammena bhoge
anya-e0903n0:1089_2: pariyesitvā sāhasena na attānaṃ sukheti na pīṇeti, na saṃvibhajati na puññāni karotīti
anya-e0903n0:1089_3: evamādinā bhante tattha bhagavatā garahitabbāgarahitabbā kāmabhogino vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n0:1090: Pucchā – kathañcāvuso tattha bhagavatā garahitabbāgarahitabbā tapassino lūkhajīvino vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n0:1091_0: Vissajjanā – tayo me gāmaṇi tapassino lūkhajīvino santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ. Katame
anya-e0903n0:1091_1: tayo. Idha gāmaṇī ekacco tapassī lūkhajīvī saddhā agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajito hoti
anya-e0903n0:1091_2: “appeva nāma kusalaṃ dhammaṃ adhigaccheyyaṃ, appeva nāma uttarimanussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1091_3: sacchikareyya”nti, so attānaṃ ātāpeti paritāpeti, kusalañca dhammaṃ nādhigacchati,
anya-e0903n0:1091_4: uttari ca manussadhammā alamariyañāṇadassanavisesaṃ na sacchikarotīti evamādinā bhante
anya-e0903n0:1091_5: tattha bhagavatā garahitabbāgarahitabbā tapassino lūkhajīvino vitthārena vibhajitvā pakāsitā.
anya-e0903n0:1094_0: Pucchā – abyākatasaṃyutte panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhaka mahātherehi paṭhamaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1094_1: saṃgītaṃ khemāsuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1095_0: Vissajjanā – antarā ca bhante sāvatthiṃ antarā ca sāketaṃ toraṇavatthusmiṃ padese
anya-e0903n0:1095_1: rājānaṃ pasenadiṃ kosalaṃ ārabbha khemāya bhikkhuniyā bhāsitaṃ. Rājā bhante pasenadi
anya-e0903n0:1095_2: kosalo yena khemā bhikkhunī tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi,
anya-e0903n0:1095_3: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho bhante rājā pasenadikosalo khemaṃ bhikkhuniṃ etadavoca “kiṃ
anya-e0903n0:1095_4: nukho ayye hoti tathāgato paraṃmaraṇā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “abyākataṃ kho
anya-e0903n0:1095_5: etaṃ mahārāja bhagavatā hoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā”ti evamādinā khemāya bhikkhuniyā
anya-e0903n0:1095_6: bhāsitaṃ. Bhagavatā ca bhante aparena samayena raññā pasenadikosalena puṭṭhena evameva puna bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1096: Kiṃ panayye nahoti tathāgato paraṃ maraṇā.
anya-e0903n0:1098: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi navamaṃ saṃgītaṃ kutūhalasālāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1099_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante vacchagottaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Vacchagotto
anya-e0903n0:1099_1: bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “purimāni bho gotama divasāni purimatarāni
anya-e0903n0:1099_2: sambahulānaṃ nānātitthiyānaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ kutūhalasālāyaṃ sannisinnānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1099_3: sannipatitānaṃ ayamantarakathā udapādī”ti evamādikaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. Tasmiṃ bhante
anya-e0903n0:1099_4: vatthusmiṃ “alañhi te vaccha kaṅkhituṃ, alaṃ vicikicchituṃ. Kaṅkhanīye ca pana te
anya-e0903n0:1099_5: ṭhāne vicikicchā uppannā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1103: Pucchā – mahāvaggasaṃyutte panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi dutiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ upaḍḍhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1104_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante sakkare nāma sakyānaṃ nigame āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ
anya-e0903n0:1104_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante ānandatthero bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “upaḍḍhamidaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1104_2: bhante brahmacariyaṃ yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā”ti.
anya-e0903n0:1104_3: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “mā hevaṃ ānanda, mā hevaṃ ānanda, sakalamevidaṃ ānanda
anya-e0903n0:1104_4: brahmacariyaṃ yadidaṃ kalyāṇamittatā kalyāṇasahāyatā kalyāṇasampavaṅkatā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1105: Mamaṃ hi ānanda kalyāṇamittaṃ āgamma jātidhammā sattā jātiyā parimuccanti.
anya-e0903n0:1108: Pucchā – bojjhaṅgasaṃyutte panāvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi chaṭṭhaṃ saṃgītaṃ kuṇḍaliyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1109_0: Vissajjanā – sākete bhante añjanavane migadāye kuṇḍaliyaṃ paribbājakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1109_1: Kuṇḍaliyo bhante paribbājako bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “ahamasmi bho gotama ārāmanissayī
anya-e0903n0:1109_2: parisāvacaro, tassa mayhaṃ bho gotama pacchābhattaṃ bhuttapātarāsassa ayamācāro hoti
anya-e0903n0:1109_3: ārāmena ārāmaṃ uyyānena uyyānaṃ anucaṅkamāmi anuvicarāmi, so tattha passāmi eke samaṇabrāhmaṇe
anya-e0903n0:1109_4: itivādappamokkhānisaṃsañceva kathaṃ kathante upārambhānisaṃsañca, bhavaṃ pana gotamo
anya-e0903n0:1109_5: kimānisaṃso viharatī”ti etaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “vijjāvimuttiphalānisaṃso
anya-e0903n0:1109_6: kho kuṇḍaliya tathāgato viharatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1111: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavvatā jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena bojjhaṅgasaṃyutte dutiye gilānavagge paṭhamagilānasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1112_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante pippaliguhāyaṃ āyasmantaṃ mahākassapattheraṃ ārabbha
anya-e0903n0:1112_1: bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante mahākassapatthero pippaliguhāyaṃ viharati ābādhiko dukkhito
anya-e0903n0:1112_2: bāḷhagilāno. Atha kho bhante bhagavā sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito yenāyasmā
anya-e0903n0:1112_3: mahākassapo tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi, nisajja kho bhagavā
anya-e0903n0:1112_4: āyasmantaṃ mahākassapaṃ etadavoca– “kacci te kassapa khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ,
anya-e0903n0:1112_5: kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no abhikkamoti.
anya-e0903n0:1112_6: Na me bhante khamanīyaṃ na yāpanīyaṃ, bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti,
anya-e0903n0:1112_7: abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no paṭikkamo”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “sattime kassapa
anya-e0903n0:1112_8: bojjhaṅgā mayā sammadakkhātā bhāvitā bahulīkatā abhiññāya sambodhāya nibbānāya saṃvattantī”ti
anya-e0903n0:1114: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiye udāyivagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ udāyisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1115_0: Vissajjanā – sumbhesu bhante setakenāma sumbhānaṃ nigame āyasmantaṃ udāyittheraṃ
anya-e0903n0:1115_1: ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante udāyitthero bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā “acchariyaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1115_2: bhante, abbhutaṃ bhante, yāva bahukatañca me bhante bhagavati pemañca gāravo ca hirī
anya-e0903n0:1115_3: ca ottappañcāti evamādikaṃ vacanaṃ avoca. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “sādhu sādhu udāyi
anya-e0903n0:1115_4: eso hi te udāyi maggo paṭiladdho. Yo te bhāvito bahulīkato, tathā tathā viharantaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1115_5: tathattāya upanessati, yathā tvaṃ ‘khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ,
anya-e0903n0:1115_6: nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānissatī”ti. Evaṃ kho bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1118: Pucchā – satipaṭṭhānasaṃyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhaka mahātherehi dutiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ satisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ kārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1119: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante ambapālivane sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “sato bhikkhave bhikkhu vihareyya sampajāno ayaṃ vo amhākaṃ anusāsanī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1121: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi catutthaṃ saṃgītaṃ sālasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1122_0: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante sālāyanāma kesalānaṃ brāhmaṇagāme sambahule bhikkhū
anya-e0903n0:1122_1: ārabbha “ye te bhikkhave bhikkhū navā acirapabbajitā adhunāgatā imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ,
anya-e0903n0:1122_2: te vo bhikkhave bhikkhū catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānaṃ bhāvanāya samādapetabbā nivesetabbā
anya-e0903n0:1124: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi chaṭṭhaṃ saṃgītaṃ sakuṇagghisuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1125_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “bhūtapubbaṃ bhikkhave
anya-e0903n0:1125_1: sakuṇagghi lāpaṃ sakuṇaṃ sahasā ajjhappattā aggahesi. Atha kho bhikkhave lāpo sakuṇo
anya-e0903n0:1125_2: sakuṇagghiyā hariyamāno evaṃ paridevasi mayamevamha alakkhikā, mayaṃ appapuññā, ye
anya-e0903n0:1125_3: mayaṃ agocare carimha paravisaye, sacejja mayaṃ gocare careyyāma sake pettike visaye,
anya-e0903n0:1125_4: na myāhaṃ sakuṇagghi alaṃ abhavissa yadidaṃ yuddhāyā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1127: Ko pana te lāpa gocaro sako pettiko visayo.
anya-e0903n0:1129: Ehi kho dāni me sakuṇagghi, ehi kho dāni me sakuṇagghi,
anya-e0903n0:1130: (Dāruguḷoviya vinivattitvā tasseva leḍḍussa antare paccupādi. Aṭṭhakathā)
anya-e0903n0:1131: Evañhi taṃ bhikkhave hoti yo agocare carati paravisaye.
anya-e0903n0:1132: Tasmātiha bhikkhave mā agocare carittha paravisaye.
anya-e0903n0:1133: Gocare bhikkhave caratha sake pettike visaye.
anya-e0903n0:1134: Gocare bhikkhave carataṃ sake pettike visaye na lacchati māro otāraṃ, na lacchati māro ārammaṇaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1136: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ bhikkhunupassayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1137_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ ānandattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n0:1137_1: bhante ānando yāvattako ahosi bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ kathāsallāpo taṃ sabbaṃ bhagavato
anya-e0903n0:1137_2: ārocesi. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “evametaṃ ānanda, evametaṃ ānanda, yohi koci ānanda
anya-e0903n0:1137_3: bhikkhu vā bhikkhunī vā catūsu satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacitto viharati, tassetaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1137_4: pāṭikaṅkhaṃ uḷāraṃ pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ sañjānissatī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1139: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiye nālandavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ cundasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1140_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃyeva ānandattheraṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā
anya-e0903n0:1140_1: bhante ānandatthero cundena samaṇuddesena saddhiṃ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami. Upasaṅkamitvā
anya-e0903n0:1140_2: bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ nisīdi. Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho bhante āyasmā ānando
anya-e0903n0:1140_3: bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “ayaṃ bhante cundo samaṇuddeso evamāha ‘āyasmā bhante sāriputto
anya-e0903n0:1140_4: parinibbuto, idamassa pattacīvara’nti. Api ca me bhante madhurakajāto viya kāyo,
anya-e0903n0:1140_5: disāpi me na pakkhāyanti, dhammāpi maṃ nappaṭibhanti ‘āyasmā sāriputto parinibbuto’ti
anya-e0903n0:1140_6: sutvā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “kiṃ nu kho te ānanda sāriputto sīlakkhandhaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1140_7: vā ādāya parinibbuto, samādhikkhandhaṃ vā, paññākkhandhaṃvā, vimuttikkhandhaṃvā,
anya-e0903n0:1140_8: vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhaṃ vā ādāya parinibbuto”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1142: Tasmātihānanda attadīpā viharatha attasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā dhammadīpā dhammasaraṇā anaññasaraṇā.
anya-e0903n0:1144: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi pañcamaṃ saṃgītaṃ bāhiyasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1145_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante āyasmantaṃ bāhiyaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante
anya-e0903n0:1145_1: bāhiyo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “sādhu me bhante bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu,
anya-e0903n0:1145_2: yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyya”nti.
anya-e0903n0:1145_3: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tasmātiha tvaṃ bāhiya ādimeva visodhehi kusalesu dhammesu.
anya-e0903n0:1145_4: Ko cādikusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ, sīlañca suvisuddhaṃ diṭṭhica ujukā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1148: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiye sīlaṭṭhitivagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi dutiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ ciraṭṭhitisuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1149_0: Vissajjanā – pāṭaliputte bhante āyasmantaṃ bhaddaṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena
anya-e0903n0:1149_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ. Āyasmā bhante bhaddo sāyanhasamayaṃ paṭisallānā vuṭṭhito
anya-e0903n0:1149_2: yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ ānandaṃ etadavoca “ko nu
anya-e0903n0:1149_3: kho āvuso ānanda hetu ko paccayo, yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko
anya-e0903n0:1149_4: hoti, ko panāvuso ānanda hetu ko paccayo, yena tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo ciraṭṭhitiko
anya-e0903n0:1149_5: hotī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “sādhu sādhu āvuso bhadda, bhaddako kho te āvuso
anya-e0903n0:1149_6: bhadda ummaṅgo”ti evamādinā āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1151: “Catunnaṃ kho āvuso satipaṭṭhānānaṃ abhāvitattā abahulīkatattā tathāgate parinibbute saddhammo na ciraṭṭhitiko hotī” –
anya-e0903n0:1153_0: Pucchā – tassāvuso bhagavatā arahato sammāsambuddhassa pāvacanasamudayabhūtāya mahāvaggapāḷiyā
anya-e0903n0:1153_1: satipaṭṭhānasaṃyutte sīlaṭṭhitivagge navamaṃ sirivaḍḍhasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0903n0:1154_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante sirivaḍḍhaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha āyasmatā ānandattherena
anya-e0903n0:1154_1: dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ. Sirivaḍḍho bhante gahapati ābādhiko hoti dukkhito
anya-e0903n0:1154_2: bāḷhagilāno. Athakho bhante āyasmā ānando yenasirivaḍḍhassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1154_3: tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi. Nisajja kho āyasmā ānando sirivaḍḍhaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1154_4: gahapatiṃ etadavoca “kacci te gahapati khamanīyaṃ, kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci dukkhā
anya-e0903n0:1154_5: vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no abhikkamo”ti. Na
anya-e0903n0:1154_6: me bhante khamanīyaṃ, na yāpanīyaṃ, bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti,
anya-e0903n0:1154_7: abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no paṭikkamo”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “tasmātiha te
anya-e0903n0:1154_8: gahapati evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ‘kāye kāyānupassī viharissāmi ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya
anya-e0903n0:1154_9: loke abhijjhā domanassaṃ. Vedanāsu. Citte. Dhammesu dhammānupassī viharissāmi ātāpī
anya-e0903n0:1154_10: sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhā domanassa’nti. Evañhi te gahapati sikkhitabba”nti.
anya-e0903n0:1154_11: Evaṃ kho āyasmatā ānandattherena dhammabhaṇḍāgārikena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1157: Pucchā – iddhipādasaṃyutte āvuso catutthaṃ moggallānasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1158_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Sambahulā bhante
anya-e0903n0:1158_1: bhikkhū heṭṭhāmigāramātupāsāde viharanti uddhatā unnaḷā capalā mukharā vikiṇṇavācā
anya-e0903n0:1158_2: muṭṭhassatino asampajānā asamāhitā bhantacittā pākatindriyā. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:1158_3: āyasmantaṃ mahāmoggallānaṃ te bhikkhū saṃvejetvā “kiṃ nu tumhe bhikkhave saṃviggā
anya-e0903n0:1158_4: lomahaṭṭhajātā ekamantaṃ ṭhitā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1159: Acchariyaṃ vata bho, abbhutaṃ vata bho.
anya-e0903n0:1162: Tumheva kho bhikkhave saṃvejetukāmena moggallānena bhikkhunā pādaṅguṭṭhakena migāramātupāsādo saṅkampito sampakampito sampadhālito.
anya-e0903n0:1163: Taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave, katamesaṃ dhammānaṃ bhāvitattā bahulīkatattā moggallāno bhikkhu evaṃ mahiddhiko evaṃ mahānubhāvo.
anya-e0903n0:1166: Pucchā – anuruddhasaṃyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi dasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ bāḷhaginānasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1167_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha āyasmatā anuruddhattherena
anya-e0903n0:1167_1: bhāsitaṃ. Sambahulā bhante bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ anuruddhaṃ ābādhikaṃ dukkhitaṃ bāḷhagilānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1167_2: etadavocuṃ “katamenāyasmato anuruddhassa vihārena viharato uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā
anya-e0903n0:1167_3: vedanā cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “catūsu kho me
anya-e0903n0:1167_4: āvuso satipaṭṭhānesu suppatiṭṭhitacittassa viharato uppannā sārīrikā dukkhā vedanā
anya-e0903n0:1167_5: cittaṃ na pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”ti evamādinā āyasmatā anuruddhattherena bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1170: Pucchā – ānāpānasaṃyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi sattamaṃ saṃgītaṃ mahākappinasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1171: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “passatha no tumhe bhikkhave etassa bhikkhuno kāyassa iñjitattaṃ vā phanditabbaṃ vā”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1173: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dutiyavagge paṭhamaṃ icchānaṅgalasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1174_0: Vissajjanā – icchānaṅgale bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “sace kho bhikkhave aññatitthiyā
anya-e0903n0:1174_1: paribbājakā evaṃ puccheyyuṃ ‘katame nāvuso vihārena samaṇo gotamo vassāvāsaṃ bahulaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1174_2: vihāsī’ti. Evaṃ puṭṭhā tumhe bhikkhave tesaṃ aññatitthiyānaṃ paribbājakānaṃ evaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1174_3: byākareyyātha ānāpānassatisamādhinā kho āvuso bhagavā vassāvāsaṃ bahulaṃ vihāsī”ti
anya-e0903n0:1177: Pucchā – sotāpattisaṃyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ cakkavattirājasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1178_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “kiñcāpi bhikkhave rājā
anya-e0903n0:1178_1: cakkavattī catunnaṃ dīpānaṃ issariyādhipaccaṃ rajjaṃ kāretvā kāyassa bhedā paraṃ
anya-e0903n0:1178_2: maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjati devānaṃ tāvatiṃsānaṃ sahabyataṃ, so tattha
anya-e0903n0:1178_3: nandane vane accharāsaṅghaparivuto dibbehi ca pañcahi kāmaguṇehi samappito samaṅgībhūto
anya-e0903n0:1178_4: paricāreti so catūhi dhammehi asamannāgato, atha kho so aparimuttova nirayā, aparimutto
anya-e0903n0:1178_5: tiracchānayoniyā, aparimutto pettivisayā, aparimutto apāyaduggativinipātā”ti evamādinā
anya-e0903n0:1180: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi tatiyaṃ saṃgītaṃ dīghāvuupāsakasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1181_0: Vissajjanā – rājagahe bhante dīghāvuṃ upāsakaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ. Bhagavā bhante dīghāvuṃ
anya-e0903n0:1181_1: upāsakaṃ ābādhikaṃ dukkhitaṃ bāḷhagilānaṃ etadavoca “kacci te dīghāvu khamanīyaṃ,
anya-e0903n0:1181_2: kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci dukkhā vedanā paṭikkamanti no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1181_3: paññāyati no abhikkamo”ti. Na me bhante khamanīyaṃ, na yāpanīyaṃ bāḷhā me dukkhā
anya-e0903n0:1181_4: vedanā abhikkamanti no paṭikkamanti, abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no paṭikkamoti. Tasmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:1181_5: bhante vatthusmiṃ “tasmātiha te dīghāvu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ buddhe aveccappasādena
anya-e0903n0:1182: Yānimāni bhante bhagavatā cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni desitāni, saṃvijjante te dhammā mayi–
anya-e0903n0:1183: Tasmātiha tvaṃ dīghāvu imesu catūsu sotāpattiyaṅgesu patiṭṭhāya cha vijjābhāgiye dhamme uttari bhāveyyāsi–
anya-e0903n0:1184: Mā tvaṃ tāta dīghāvu evaṃ manasākāsi.
anya-e0903n0:1185: Iṅgha tvaṃ tāta dīghāvu yadeva te bhagavā āha, tadeva tvaṃ sādhukaṃ manasikarohi.
anya-e0903n0:1189: Dīghāvu bhikkhave upāsako pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
anya-e0903n0:1191: Pucchā – tenāvuso bhagavatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena sotāpattisaṃyutte sattamaṃ saṃgītaṃ veḷudvāreyyasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1192: Vissajjanā – kosalesu bhante veḷudvāre nāma kosalānaṃ brāhmaṇa gāme veḷudvāreyyake brāhmaṇagahapatike ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1193_0: Veḷudvāreyyakā bhante brāhmaṇagahapatikā bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ “mayaṃ bho gotama
anya-e0903n0:1193_1: evaṃkāmā evaṃchandā evaṃadhippāyā puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvaseyyāma…pe… jātarūparajataṃ
anya-e0903n0:1193_2: sādiyeyyāma, kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyyāma, tesaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1193_3: no bhavaṃ gotamo amhākaṃ evaṃkāmānaṃ evaṃchandānaṃ evaṃadhippāyānaṃ tathā dammaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1193_4: desetu, yathā mayaṃ puttasambādhasayanaṃ ajjhāvaseyyāma…pe… kāyassa bhedā paraṃ maraṇā
anya-e0903n0:1193_5: sugatiṃ saggaṃ lokaṃ upapajjeyyāmā”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “attūpanāyikaṃ vo
anya-e0903n0:1193_6: gahapatayo dhammapariyāyaṃ desessāmi, taṃ suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti
anya-e0903n0:1196_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso tatiye saraṇānivagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi
anya-e0903n0:1196_1: paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ paṭhamamahānāmasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1197_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0903n0:1197_1: bhāsitaṃ. Mahānāmo bhante sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “idaṃ bhante kapilavatthu iddhañceva
anya-e0903n0:1197_2: phītañca bāhujaññaṃ ākiṇṇamanussaṃ sambādhabyūhaṃ, so khvāhaṃ bhante bhagavantaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1197_3: vā payirupāsitvā manobhāvanīye vā bhikkhū sāyanhasamayaṃ kapilavatthuṃ pavisanto
anya-e0903n0:1197_4: bhantenapi hatthinā samāgacchāmi, bhantenapi assena samāgacchāmi, bhantenapi rathena
anya-e0903n0:1197_5: samāgacchāmi, bhantenapi sakaṭena samāgacchāmi, bhantenapi purisena samāgacchāmi,
anya-e0903n0:1197_6: tassa mayhaṃ bhante tasmiṃ samaye mussateva bhagavantaṃ ārabbha sati, mussati dhammaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1197_7: ārabbha sati, mussati saṅghaṃ ārabbha sati, tassa mayhaṃ bhante evaṃ hoti imamhi
anya-e0903n0:1197_8: cāhaṃ samaye kālaṃ kareyyaṃ, kā mayhaṃ gati, ko abhisamparāyo”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ
anya-e0903n0:1197_9: “mā bhāyi mahānāma, mā bhāyi mahānāma, apāpakaṃ te maraṇaṃ bhavissati apāpikā kālaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1199: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi pañcamaṃ saṃgītaṃ dutiyasaraṇānisakkasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1200: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme mahānāmaṃyeva sakkaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1201_0: Mahānāmo bhante sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “idha bhante saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato,
anya-e0903n0:1201_1: so bhagavatā byākato ‘sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’ti. Tatra
anya-e0903n0:1201_2: sudaṃ bhante sambahulā sakkā saṅgamma samāgamma ujjhāyanti khīyanti vipācenti ‘acchariyaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1202_0: Bho, ettha dāni ko na sotāpanno bhavissati, yatra hi nāma saraṇāni sakko kālaṅkato,
anya-e0903n0:1202_1: so bhagavatā byākato ‘sotāpanno avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo’ti, saraṇāni
anya-e0903n0:1202_2: sakko sikkhāya aparipūrakārī ahosī”ti tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yo so mahānāma dīgharattaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1202_3: upāsako buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato, so kathaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1204: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi chaṭṭhaṃ saṃgītaṃ paṭhamaanāthapiṇḍikasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kena kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1205: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ ārabbha āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1206_0: Āyasmā bhante sāriputtatthero āyasmatā ānandattherena pacchāsamaṇena saddhiṃ yena
anya-e0903n0:1206_1: anāthapiṇḍikassa gahapatissa nivesanaṃ tenupasaṅkami, upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane
anya-e0903n0:1206_2: nisīdi, nisajja kho āyasmā sāriputto anāthapiṇḍikaṃ gahapatiṃ ābādhikaṃ dukkhitaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1206_3: bāḷhagilānaṃ etadavoca “kacci te gahapati khamanīyaṃ kacci yāpanīyaṃ, kacci dukkhā
anya-e0903n0:1206_4: vedanā paṭikkamanti, no abhikkamanti, paṭikkamosānaṃ paññāyati, no abhikkamo”ti,
anya-e0903n0:1206_5: na me bhante khamanīyaṃ, na yāpanīyaṃ, bāḷhā me dukkhā vedanā abhikkamanti, no paṭikkamanti,
anya-e0903n0:1206_6: abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati, no paṭikkamoti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yathā rūpena
anya-e0903n0:1206_7: kho gahapati buddhe appasādena samannāgato assutavā puthujjano kāyassa bhedā paraṃ
anya-e0903n0:1206_8: maraṇā apāyaṃ duggatiṃ vinipātaṃ niyaraṃ upapajjati tathārūpo te buddhe appasādo
anya-e0903n0:1206_9: natthi, atthi ca kho te gahapati buddhe aveccappasādo ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṃ sammāsambuddho…pe…
anya-e0903n0:1206_10: bhagavā’ti tañca pana te buddhe aveccappasādaṃ attani samanupassato ṭhānaso vedanā
anya-e0903n0:1206_11: paṭippassambheyyā”ti evamādinā āyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1210: Adaliddoti taṃ āhu, amoghaṃ tassa jīvitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1215: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso puññābhisandavaggo porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi sattamaṃ saṃgītaṃ mahānāmasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1216: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ mahānāmaṃ sakkaṃ ārabbha bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1217_0: Mahānāmo bhante sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “kittāvatā nu kho bhante upāsako hotī”ti.
anya-e0903n0:1217_1: Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yato kho mahānāma buddhaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hoti, dhammaṃ saraṇaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1217_2: gato hoti, saṅghaṃ saraṇaṃ gato hotī”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1218: Kittāvatā nu kho bhante upāsako hoti.
anya-e0903n0:1220: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi navamaṃ saṃgītaṃ kāḷigodhasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ kārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1221_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kāḷigodhaṃ nāma sākiyāniṃ ārabbha “catūhi kho godhe dhammehi
anya-e0903n0:1221_1: samannāgatā ariyasāvikā sotāpannā hoti avinipātadhammā niyatā sambodhiparāyaṇā”ti
anya-e0903n0:1222: Lābhā te godhe, suladdhaṃ te godhe, sotāpattiphalaṃ tayā godhe –
anya-e0903n0:1224: Pucchā – tenāvuso jānatā…pe… sammāsambuddhena sotāpattisaṃyutte puññābhisandavagge dasamaṃ nandiyasakkasuttaṃ kattha kaṃ ārabbha kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1225_0: Vissajjanā – sakkesu bhante kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme nandiyaṃ sakkaṃ ārabbha
anya-e0903n0:1225_1: bhāsitaṃ. Nandiyo bhante sakko bhagavantaṃ etadavoca “yasseva nu kho bhante ariyasāvakassa
anya-e0903n0:1225_2: cattāri sotāpattiyaṅgāni sabbena sabbaṃ sabbathāsabbaṃ natthi, sveva nu kho bhante
anya-e0903n0:1225_3: ariyasāvako pamādavihārī”ti. Tasmiṃ bhante vatthusmiṃ “yassa kho nandiya cattāri
anya-e0903n0:1225_4: sotāpattiyaṅgāni sabbenasabbaṃ sabbathāsabbaṃ natthi, tamahaṃ bāhiro puthujjanapakkhe
anya-e0903n0:1228: Pucchā – saccasaṃyutte āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāyakamahātherehi dasamaṃ saṃgītaṃ tiracchānakathāsuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1229_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha mā bhikkhave anekavihitaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1229_1: tiracchānakathaṃ katheyyātha. Seyyathidaṃ, rājakathaṃ corakathaṃ mahāmattakathaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1229_2: senākathaṃ bhayakathaṃ yuddhakathaṃ annakathaṃ pānakathaṃ vatthakathaṃ sayanakathaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1231: Tasmātiha bhikkhave idaṃ dukkhanti yogo karaṇīyo…pe… ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti yogo karaṇīyo.
anya-e0903n0:1233_0: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso dhammacakkappavattanavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi
anya-e0903n0:1233_1: paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ dhammacakkapavattanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1234_0: Vissajjanā – bārāṇasiyaṃ bhante isipatane migadāye pañcavaggiye bhikkhū ārabbha “dve
anya-e0903n0:1234_1: me bhikkhave antā pabbajitena nasevitabbā. Katame dve, yo cāyaṃ kāmesu kāmasukhallikānuyogo
anya-e0903n0:1234_2: hīno gammo pothujjaniko anariyo anatthasaṃhito, yo cāyaṃ attakilamathānuyogo dukkho
anya-e0903n0:1234_3: anariyo anatthasaṃhito, ete kho bhikkhave ubho ante anupagamma majjhimāpaṭipadā tathāgatena
anya-e0903n0:1236: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso koṭigāmavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi pañcamaṃ saṃgītaṃ āsavakkhayasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1237_0: Vissajjanā – sāvatthiyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “jānatohaṃ bhikkhave passato
anya-e0903n0:1237_1: āsavānaṃ khayaṃ vadāmi, no ajānato apassato. Kiñca bhikkhave jānato passato āsavānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1237_2: khayo hoti, idaṃ dukkhanti bhikkhave jānato passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti, ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti,
anya-e0903n0:1237_3: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti, ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadāti jānato passato āsavānaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1237_4: khayo hoti. Evaṃ kho bhikkhave jānato evaṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti. Tasmātiha
anya-e0903n0:1237_5: bhikkhave “idaṃ dukkha”nti yogo karaṇīyo, ayaṃ dukkhasamudayoti, ayaṃ dukkhanirodhoti,
anya-e0903n0:1237_6: ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminīpaṭipadāti yogo karaṇīyo”ti evaṃ kho bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1239: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso sīsapāvanavagge porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi paṭhamaṃ saṃgītaṃ sīsapāvanasuttaṃ bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1240_0: Vissajjanā – kosambiyaṃ bhante sīsapāvane sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha
anya-e0903n0:1240_1: bhikkhave, katamaṃ nukho bahutaraṃ yāni vā mayā parittāni sīsapāpaṇṇāni pāṇinā gahitāni
anya-e0903n0:1240_2: yadidaṃ upari sīsapāvane”ti evamādinā bhagavatā bhāsitaṃ.
anya-e0903n0:1242: Pucchā – tattheva āvuso porāṇakehi dhammasaṃgāhakamahātherehi pariyosānabhāvena saṃgīto pañcagatipeyyālavagge, bhagavatā kattha kaṃ ārabbha kathañca bhāsito.
anya-e0903n0:1243_0: Vissajjanā – vesāliyaṃ bhante sambahule bhikkhū ārabbha “taṃ kiṃ maññatha bhikkhave,
anya-e0903n0:1243_1: katamaṃ nu kho bahutaraṃ, yo vāyaṃ mayā paritto nakhasikhāyaṃ paṃsu āropito, ayaṃ
anya-e0903n0:1245: Vissajjanā – sekkhā ca bhante puthujjanakalyāṇakā ca sikkhanti.
anya-e0903n0:1251: Vissajjanā – yesaṃ bhante vattati te dhārenti.
anya-e0903n0:1253: Vissajjanā – bhagavato bhante vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
